33a4('bum): pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ma rig pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa
33a5('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ming dang gzugs mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / skye mched drug mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba mi
33a6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sred pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / len pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / srid pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / skye ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
33a7('bum): rga shi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / bzod pa'i pha
33b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / shes rab kyi
33b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
33b3('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chen po stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi
33b4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
33b5('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi dmigs
33b6('bum): pa'i tshul dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul
33b7('bum): dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul
34a1('bum): dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dbang po rnams mi dmigs
34a2('bum): pa'i tshul dang / stobs rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lam mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i bden
34a3('bum): pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / bsam gtan rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / tshad med pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
34a4('bum): pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
34a5('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mngon par shes pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ting nge 'dzin
34a6('bum): rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mi 'jigs pa
34a7('bum): rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / /byams pa chen po rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / snying rje chen po mi dmigs
34b1('bum): pa'i tshul dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / thams cad shes pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi dmigs
34b2('bum): pa'i tshul dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa de lta bur 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad
34b3('bum): ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan/ ci'i phyir na byang chub
34b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su bzung ba bstan/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin
34b5('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
34b6('bum): pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam
34b7('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med
35a1('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid
35a2('bum): dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba
35a3('bum): bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags
35a4('bum): pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis
35a5('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge
35a6('bum): 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams
35a7('bum): pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ni/ ci'i phyir bstan/ ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
35b1('bum): mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan cing / des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
35b2('bum): pa'i tshe/ brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhing / des na/ mngon par shes pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba yin/ ci'i phyir na des sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas
35b3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya
35b4('bum): bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
35b5('bum): thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad bar mi 'gyur pa yin/ ci'i phyir na 'khrug pa med pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis rtag tu mnyam par gzhag
35b6('bum): par 'gyur ba yin/ ci'i phyir na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs
35b7('bum): pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon
36a1('bum): par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan pa yin/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA
36a2('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/ /phyi stong pa nyid
36a3('bum): kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/ /stong pa nyid stong
36a4('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/ /don dam
36a5('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan
36a6('bum): to| |'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
36a7('bum): theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir
36b1('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/ /chos thams cad stong
36b2('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/ /mi
36b3('bum): dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher
36b4('bum): bstan to/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
36b5('bum): theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed
36b6('bum): pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus
36b7('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /
37a1('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las
37a2('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi
37a3('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /
37a4('bum): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /
37a5('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
37a6('bum): pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa
37a7('bum): med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi
37b1('bum): dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
37b2('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu
37b3('bum): phyin pa la spyod cing brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/ /des na/ mngon par shes pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs
37b4('bum): rgyas kyi zhing du 'dod zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar
37b5('bum): 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
37b6('bum): thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro/ /'khrug pa med pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro/ /
37b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i
38a1('bum): spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags
38a2('bum): shing / khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to/ /sems dang po
38a3('bum): bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i
38a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa
38a5('bum): nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa
38a6('bum): nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad
38a7('bum): stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo
38b1('bum): bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan
38b2('bum): lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
38b3('bum): 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa
38b4('bum): med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi dmigs pa bzhi dang / so
38b5('bum): so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
38b6('bum): chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par rtsa ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
38b7('bum): phyin pa la spyod cing / brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/ /des na/ mngon par shes pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing
39a1('bum): nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du
39a2('bum): bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de'ang
39a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro/ /'khrug pa med pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu
39a4('bum): mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa med pa'i
39a5('bum): spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las
39a6('bum): mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su gzung ba
39a7('bum): bstan to/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ sems bcu ba bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
39b1('bum): phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid
39b2('bum): dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas
39b3('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad
39b4('bum): stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
39b5('bum): stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
39b6('bum): bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
39b7('bum): 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon
40a1('bum): pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
40a2('bum): dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang
40a3('bum): bstan| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan to/ des na/ byang chub sems dpa'
40a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/ /des na/ mngon par shes pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa
40a5('bum): med pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dag ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya
40a6('bum): ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom
40a7('bum): ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro/ /'khrug pa med pa dang / mnyam
40b1('bum): par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med
40b2('bum): pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i
40b3('bum): spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems
40b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol
40b5('bum): tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes
40b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid
40b7('bum): dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa
41a1('bum): nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po
41a2('bum): med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul
41a3('bum): gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /
41a4('bum): bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
41a5('bum): 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs
41a6('bum): kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po
41a7('bum): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par
41b1('bum): rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/ /des na/
41b2('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis/ sangs
41b3('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dung du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum
41b4('bum): tshogs par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang zos pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par mi
41b5('bum): 'gyur ro/ /'khrug ba med pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag
41b6('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel
41b7('bum): pa'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing / khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /chen po
42a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i
42a2('bum): bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus
42a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /
42a4('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong
42a5('bum): pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong
42a6('bum): pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar
42a7('bum): gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong pa bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags
42b1('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam
42b2('bum): par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par
42b3('bum): shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
42b4('bum): bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon
42b5('bum): par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing brdzus te
42b6('bum): skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/ /des na/ mngon par shes pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing
42b7('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i
43a1('bum): rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
43a2('bum): nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro/ /'khrug pa med pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par
43a3('bum): 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par
43a4('bum): gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing
43a5('bum): khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po brgya lnga pa/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid
43a6('bum): kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i
43a7('bum): lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam
43b1('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong
43b2('bum): pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
43b3('bum): nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /
43b4('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /
43b5('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi
43b6('bum): dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
43b7('bum): 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs
44a1('bum): kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa
44a2('bum): chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes
44a3('bum): pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing brdzus te skye
44a4('bum): bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/ /des na/ mngon par shes pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong
44a5('bum): zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dung du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta
44a6('bum): bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob
44a7('bum): par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro/ /'khrug pa med pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur
44b1('bum): ro| |byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i
44b2('bum): spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i
44b3('bum): spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems
44b4('bum): bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
44b5('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid
44b6('bum): dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong
44b7('bum): pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong
45a1('bum): pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
45a2('bum): nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
45a3('bum): bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms
45a4('bum): par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
45a5('bum): smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa
45a6('bum): bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems
45a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
45b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/ /des na/ mngon par shes pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro/ /
45b2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba
45b3('bum): dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de'ang rnam pa
45b4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro/ /'khrug pa med pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par
45b5('bum): gzhag par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spabs pa dang / rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam
45b6('bum): par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing
45b7('bum): khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to/ /sems dang po
46a1('bum): bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
46a2('bum): pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid
46a3('bum): dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas
46a4('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad
46a5('bum): stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
46a6('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan
46a7('bum): lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms
46b1('bum): par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon
46b2('bum): pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so
46b3('bum): so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
46b4('bum): chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu
46b5('bum): phyin pa la spyod cing brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/ /des na/ mngon par shes pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas
46b6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya
46b7('bum): bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
47a1('bum): nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro/ /'khrug pa med pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu
47a2('bum): mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa med
47a3('bum): pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs ba dang / 'jig rten
47a4('bum): thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs ba dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
47a5('bum): dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
47a6('bum): phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
47a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam
47b1('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa
47b2('bum): stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid
47b3('bum): dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /
47b4('bum): dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang /
47b5('bum): tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar
47b6('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin
47b7('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
48a1('bum): brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par rtse ba dag kyang
48a2('bum): bstan te/ des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/ /des na/ mngon par
48a3('bum): shes pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom
48a4('bum): ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par
48a5('bum): 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro//
48a6('bum): 'khrug pa med pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs
48a7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs
48b1('bum): pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /thog ma dang tha ma med
48b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems
48b3('bum): dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam
48b4('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa
48b5('bum): nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
48b6('bum): dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos
48b7('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul
49a1('bum): gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags
49a2('bum): pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas
49a3('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad
49a4('bum): dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying
49a5('bum): rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam
49a6('bum): par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/ /des
49a7('bum): na mngon par shes pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa med pa'i tshas can du'ang 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis
49b1('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun
49b2('bum): sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par mi
49b3('bum): 'gyur ro/ /'khrug pa med pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi
49b4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun ched pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i
49b5('bum): spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /dor ba med pa stong pa
49b6('bum): nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di
49b7('bum): lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
50a1('bum): phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /
50a2('bum): chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma
50a3('bum): med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong ba nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa
50a4('bum): stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag
50a5('bum): par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /
50a6('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar
50a7('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge
50b1('bum): 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen
50b2('bum): po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu
50b3('bum): 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes
50b4('bum): bya'o| |des na/ mngon par shes pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa med ba'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang
50b5('bum): gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang
50b6('bum): phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad
50b7('bum): par mi 'gyur ro/ /'khrug ba med pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
51a1('bum): de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang /
51a2('bum): rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs
51a3('bum): pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to/ /sems dang po bskyed ba nas sems
51a4('bum): bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
51a5('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa
51a6('bum): nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las
51a7('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi
51b1('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye
51b2('bum): bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i
51b3('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar
51b4('bum): pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga
51b5('bum): dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs ba bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
51b6('bum): byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dras pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes
51b7('bum): pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing brdzus te skye bar 'gyur
52a1('bum): zhes bya'o/ /des na/ mngon par shes pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du
52a2('bum): 'dong zhing dge pa'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta
52a3('bum): bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma
52a4('bum): gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro/ /'khrug pa med pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro/ /byang
52a5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i
52a6('bum): spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs
52a7('bum): pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to/ /sems dang po bskyed pa
52b1('bum): nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
52b2('bum): pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang
52b3('bum): stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las
52b4('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan
52b5('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar
52b6('bum): gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam
52b7('bum): yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa
53a1('bum): brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa
53a2('bum): dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so
53a3('bum): so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
53a4('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi
53a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/ /des na/ mngon par shes pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro/ /sangs
53a6('bum): rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba
53a7('bum): dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de'ang rnam
53b1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro/ /'khrug pa med pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par
53b2('bum): gzhag par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam
53b3('bum): par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing
53b4('bum): khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan bar 'gyur ro/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chan po yongs su bzung ba bstan to/ /sems
53b5('bum): dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod
53b6('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa
53b7('bum): nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
54a1('bum): dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /
54a2('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po
54a3('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang /
54a4('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs
54a5('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
54a6('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
54a7('bum): dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos pa 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/
54b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
54b2('bum): po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/ /des na/ mngon par shes pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur
54b3('bum): ro| |sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud
54b4('bum): du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa
54b5('bum): de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro/ /'khrug pa med pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag
54b6('bum): tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa med pa'i
54b7('bum): spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang / /don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad
55a1('bum): las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
55a2('bum): dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
55a3('bum): dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab
55a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /
55a5('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /
55a6('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid
55a7('bum): stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong pa bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba bzhi dang / dbang po lnga
55b1('bum): dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa
55b2('bum): bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo
55b3('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs
55b4('bum): pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag
55b5('bum): kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na/ byang chub sems dpa'
55b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/ /des na/ mngon par shes pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa med pa'i
55b7('bum): chos can du'ang 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur
56a1('bum): stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ /sangs
56a2('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro/ /'khrug pa med
56a3('bum): pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul
56a4('bum): gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa
56a5('bum): dang / /don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /dngos po med pa stong pa
56a6('bum): nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i
56a7('bum): lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan
56b1('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid
56b2('bum): dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stang pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor
56b3('bum): ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong
56b4('bum): pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
56b5('bum): bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden ba bzhi dang / bsam gtan
56b6('bum): bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam
56b7('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin
57a1('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang /
57a2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag
57a3('bum): kyang bstan te/ des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/ /des na/ mngon par
57a4('bum): shes pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas
57a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs
57a6('bum): par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur
57a7('bum): ro| |'khrug pa med pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi
57b1('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i
57b2('bum): spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa
57b3('bum): nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di
57b4('bum): lta ste| sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha
57b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang /
57b6('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba
57b7('bum): med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa
58a1('bum): nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /
58a2('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa
58a3('bum): bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
58a4('bum): par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs
58a5('bum): kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang /
58a6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dris pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag
58a7('bum): kyang bstan te/ des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/ /des na/ mngon par shes
58b1('bum): pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
58b2('bum): de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ /sangs
58b3('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro/ /'khrug pa med pa dang /
58b4('bum): mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa
58b5('bum): med pa'i stobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i
58b6('bum): spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
58b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i
59a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan
59a2('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong
59a3('bum): pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa
59a4('bum): stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong
59a5('bum): pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong
59a6('bum): ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags
59a7('bum): pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar ba brgyad dang / mthar gyis
59b1('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams
59b2('bum): cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang /
59b3('bum): snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul
59b4('bum): gyi rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/ /
59b5('bum): des na| mngon par shes pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge pa'i rtsa ba gang gis
59b6('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun
59b7('bum): sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad
60a1('bum): par mi 'gyur ro/ /'phrug pa med pa dang mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems
60a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang /
60a3('bum): rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa
60a4('bum): dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u bco lnga pa'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po
60a5('bum): brgya drug pa/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems bar gyur te/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis de ltar chos kyi char ba 'di pheb ste bstan na/ de la bdag gis kyang
60a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mchod par bya ba'i phyir me tog dag mngon par sprul bar byas te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
60a7('bum): dpa' chen po rnams dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams dang / gnas brtan rab 'byor la gtor bar bya'o/ /mngon par gtor bar bya'o/ /rab tu gtor bar bya'o/ /snyam mo//
60b1('bum): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang / mtshe ma'i lha dang / dga' ldan gyi lha dang / 'phrul dga'i
60b2('bum): lha dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang / tshangs ris kyi lha dang / tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha dang / tshangs chen gyi lha dang / snang ba'i lha dang / chung
60b3('bum): snang gi lha dang / tshad med snang ba'i lha dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha dang / dge ba'i lha dang / chung dge'i lha dang / tshad med dge ba'i lha dang / dge rgyas kyi lha dang / che ba'i lha dang /
60b4('bum): chung che'i lha dang / tshad med che ba'i lha dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha dang / mi che ba'i lha dang / mi gdung ba'i lha dang / shin tu mthong ba'i lha dang / gya nom snang ba'i lha dang / 'og
60b5('bum): min gyi lha ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis chos kyi char pa 'di phab ste bstan na/ de la bdag cag gis kyang shes
60b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ me tog dag mngon par sprul par byas te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo rnams
60b7('bum): dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams dang / gnas brtan rab 'byor la gtor bar bya'o/ /mngon par gtor bar bya'o/ /rab tu gtor bar bya'o/ snyam mo/ /de nas lha'i dbang po
61a1('bum): brgya byin dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang / mtshe ma'i lha
61a2('bum): dang / dga' ldan gyi lha dang / 'phrul dga'i lha dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang / tshangs ris kyi lha dang / tshangs lha nyi phan gyi lha dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha dang /
61a3('bum): tshangs chen gyi lha dang / snang ba'i lha dang / chung snang gi lha dang / tshad med snang ba'i lha dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha dang / dge ba'i lha dang / chung dge'i lha dang / tshad med dge ba'i
61a4('bum): lha dang / dge rgyas kyi lha dang / che ba'i lha dang / chung che'i lha dang / tshad med che ba'i lha dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha dang / mi che ba'i lha dang / mi gdung ba'i lha dang / shin tu
61a5('bum): mthong ba'i lha dang / gya nom snang ba'i lha dang / 'og min gyi lha de dag thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lha rdzas kyi me tog mnad ra ba
61a6('bum): mang po mngon par sprul te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams dang / gnas brtan
61a7('bum): rab 'byor la 'thor bar gyur to/ /mngon par 'thor bar gyur to/ /rab tu 'thor bar gyur to/ /me tog de dag gis gtor ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
61b1('bum): rten gyi khams 'di gzhi me tog gis khebs par gyur nas stong gi bar snang la'ang me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams tsam
61b2('bum): mdangs dga' zhing yid du 'ong bas kun nas gnas par gyur to/ /de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ 'di ltar lha rnams kyis mngon par gtor
61b3('bum): ba'i me tog 'di dag ni/ bdag gis sngon chad lha'i gnas thams cad na'ang yod par ma mthong ste/ me tog 'di dag ni/ mngon par sprul pa'o/ /'di ltar lha'i phu dag gis
61b4('bum): mngon par gtor ba'i me tog 'di dag ni/ ldum bu las byung ba ma yin/ chu las skyes pa ma yin/ thang las skyes pa ma yin/ thang las skyes pa ma yin no/ /'di ltar lha'i bu dag gis mngon par gtor
61b5('bum): ba'i me tog 'di dag ni/ yid las byung ba ste/ me tog 'di dag ni/ ldum bu las byung ba ma yin no/ snyam pa dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis gnas brtan rab 'byor
61b6('bum): la 'di skad ces smras so/ / btsun pa rab 'byor/ me tog 'di dag ni/ ma byung ba ste/ me tog 'di dag ni/ yid las byung ba ma yin no/ /ldum bu las byung ba ma yin no/ /rab
61b7('bum): 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka/ de skad du me tog 'di dag ma skyes pa ste/ me tog 'di dag yid las byung ba ma yin/ ldum bu las byung ba ma yin no zhes zer ba ni/ kau shi ka
62a1('bum): de ltar ma skyes pa ni/ me tog kyang ma yin no/ /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ me tog 'di dag nye tshe ma byung bar zad dam/ 'on te
62a2('bum): gzugs kyang ma byung / tshor ba'ang ma byung / 'du shes kyang ma byung / 'du byed kyang ma byung / rnam par shes pa'ang ma byung ba yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka /me
62a3('bum): tog 'di dag nye tshe ma byung bar ma zad kyi/ kau shi ka /gzugs kyang ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni/ gzugs ma yin no/ /kau shi ka /tshor ba'ang ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung
62a4('bum): ba de ni/ tshor ba ma yin no/ /kau shi ka /'du shes kyang ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni 'du shes ma yin no/ /kau shi ka 'du byed kyang ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni/ 'du

62a6('bum): ma yin no/ /kau shi ka /rna ba ni/ ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni/ rna ba ma yin no/ /kau shi ka /sna ni/ ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni/ sna ma yin no/ /kau shi ka /lce ni/ ma
62a7('bum): byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni/ lce ma yin no/ /kau shi ka /lus ni/ ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni lus ma yin no/ /kau shi ka /yid ni/ ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni/
62b1('bum): yid ma yin no/ /kau shi ka /gzugs ni/ ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni/ gzugs ma yin no/ /kau shi ka /sgra ni/ ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni/ sgra ma yin no/ /kau shi
62b2('bum): ka| dri ni/ ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni/ dri ma yin no/ /kau shi ka /ro ni/ ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung byung ba de ni/ ro ma yin no/ /kau shi ka /reg ni/ ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni
62b3('bum): reg ma yin no/ /kau shi ka /chos ni/ ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni chos ma yin no/ /kau shi ka /mig gi rnam par shes pa ni/ ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni/ mig gi rnam

63a1('bum): pa ni/ ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no/ /kau shi ka /sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni/ ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni/

64b1('bum): phyin pa ni ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ /kau shi ka /nang stong pa nyid ni/ ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni/ nang stong pa nyid ma yin no//

65a1('bum): stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /kau shi ka /rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni/ ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /kau shi ka /chos thams
65a2('bum): cad stong pa nyid ni/ ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /kau shi ka /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni/ ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni/

66b7('bum): ka / phyir mi 'ong ba ni/ ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba ma yin no/ /kau shi ka /dgra bcom pa ni/ ma byung ba ste/ gang ma byung ba de ni/ dgra bcom pa ma yin no/ /

67b7('bum): ba ni/ btags pa tsam mo/ /btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni/ chos nyid de/ de ni/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis mi 'gal bar bstan to/ /kau shi ka /sna ni/ btags pa tsam mo//

68a3('bum): gang yin pa de ni/ chos nyid de/ de ni/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis mi 'gal bar bstan to/ /kau shi ka /yid ni/ btags pa tsam mo/ /btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni/
