167a5('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /lus kyi 'dus
167a6('bum): te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral
167a7('bum): ba'ang ma yin no/ /kau shi ka /de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /yid kyi
167b1('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /
167b2('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /kau shi ka /de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni/ mig gi 'dus te reg
167b3('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang
167b4('bum): ma yin no/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
167b5('bum): tshor ba'i chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /kau shi ka /de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
167b6('bum): tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /
167b7('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos
168a1('bum): nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /kau shi ka /de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
168a2('bum): gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin
168a3('bum): no/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i
168a4('bum): chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /kau shi ka /de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i
168a5('bum): de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /lce'i
168a6('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos
168a7('bum): nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /kau shi ka /de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
168b1('bum): ba'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /lus kyi 'dus
168b2('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan
168b3('bum): dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /kau shi ka /de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma
168b4('bum): yin no/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ma
168b5('bum): yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin
168b6('bum): no/ /kau shi ka /de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni/ sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /sa'i khams kyi chos nyid dang ldan
168b7('bum): pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /sa'i khams kyi chos nyid ma yin pa

169a2('bum): ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /chu'i khams kyi chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma

169a4('bum): khams kyi de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /me'i khams kyi chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid
169a5('bum): ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /me'i khams kyi chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /kau shi ka /de
169a6('bum): bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni/ rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /rlung gi khams kyi chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin
169a7('bum): bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /rlung gi khams kyi chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang
169b1('bum): ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /kau shi ka /de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni/ nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /

169b4('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi
169b5('bum): de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma

174a5('bum): no/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid ma yin pa
174a6('bum): gzhan dang ldan ba'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang ldan
174a7('bum): pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
174b1('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin
174b2('bum): no/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid
174b3('bum): dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi
174b4('bum): chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang
174b5('bum): ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan
174b6('bum): pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin
174b7('bum): pa de ni/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma
175a1('bum): yin no/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi chos
175a2('bum): nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang
175a3('bum): ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de
175a4('bum): bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang
175a5('bum): ma yin no/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /mi dmigs pa stong
175a6('bum): pa nyid kyi chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//
175a7('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan ba'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med
175b1('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /dngos po med
175b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral
175b3('bum): ba'ang ma yin no/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi
175b4('bum): chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa
175b5('bum): nyid kyi chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo po nyid stong pa nyid
175b6('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /dngos po med
175b7('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang

176a2('bum): yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan
176a3('bum): pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang
176a4('bum): yin pa de ni/ yang dag par spong ba'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan ba'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /yang dag par spong ba'i chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//

176b1('bum): gyi rkang pa'i chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni/ dbang po'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang
176b2('bum): ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /dbang po'i chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /dbang po'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang

176b6('bum): yan lag gi de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin pa bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /byang chub kyi yan lag gi chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /byang chub kyi yan lag
176b7('bum): gi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /byang chub kyi yan lag gi chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin

179a1('bum): nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs

180a1('bum): pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /kau shi ka /de bzhin

180b1('bum): pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
180b2('bum): kyi chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /kau shi ka/ 'di ni/ gang chos 'di dag thams cad dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin pa de'i mthu
180b3('bum): ste/ byin gyi rlabs med pa'i tshul gyis/ de'i byin gyi rlabs so// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po brgya bcu gnyis pa/ kau shi ka /gang yang 'di
180b4('bum): skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gang nas btsal bar bya zhes zer ba ni/ kau shi ka/ gzugs las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ gzugs
180b5('bum): las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /tshor ba las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ tshor ba las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /'du shes las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ 'du shes las gzhan
180b6('bum): du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /'du byed las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ 'du byed las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /rnam par shes pa las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ rnam par shes pa las gzhan
180b7('bum): du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar gzugs gang yin pa dang / tshor ba gang yin pa dang / 'du shes gang yin pa dang / 'du byed gang yin pa dang / rnam
181a1('bum): par shes pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin ba dang / btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag
181a2('bum): thams cad ni/ ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bltar med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /kau shi ka/
181a3('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ mig las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ mig las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /rna ba
181a4('bum): las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ rna ba las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /sna las kyang bcol bar mi bya/ sna las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /lce las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ lce
181a5('bum): las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /lus las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ lus las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /yid las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ yid las gzhan du'ang btsal
181a6('bum): bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar mig gang yin pa dang / rna ba gang yin pa dang / sna gang yin pa dang / lce gang yin pa dang / lus gang yin pa dang / yid
181a7('bum): gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni/ ldan pa'ang ma yin mi
181b1('bum): ldan pa'ang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bltar med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /kau shi ka /gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
181b2('bum): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gzugs las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ gzugs las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /sgra las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ sgra las gzhan du'ang
181b3('bum): btsal bar mi bya'o/ /dri las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ dri las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /ro las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ ro las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /reg las kyang btsal
181b4('bum): bar mi bya/ reg las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /chos las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ chos las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar gzugs
181b5('bum): gang yin pa dang / sgra gang yin pa dang / dri gang yin pa dang / ro gang yin pa dang / reg gang yin pa dang / chos gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
181b6('bum): phyin pa gang yin pa dang / btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni/ ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bltar med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ mtshan nyid
181b7('bum): gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /kau shi ka /gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ mig gi rnam par shes pa las kyang
182a1('bum): btsal bar mi bya/ mig gi rnam par shes pa las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ rna ba'i rnam par shes
182a2('bum): pa las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ sna'i rnam par shes pa las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa
182a3('bum): las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ lce'i rnam par shes pa las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa las gzhan
182a4('bum): du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/
182a5('bum): 'di ltar mig gi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /
182a6('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / btsal
182a7('bum): ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni/ ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ /bltar med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan
182b1('bum): nyid med pa'o/ /kau shi ka /gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ mig gi 'dus
182b2('bum): te reg pa las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa las
182b3('bum): kyang btsal bar mi bya/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//
182b4('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa
182b5('bum): las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa gang
182b6('bum): yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha
182b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni/ ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bltar med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ mtshan
183a1('bum): nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ mig gi
183a2('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
183a3('bum): tshor ba las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las kyang btsal bar mi
183a4('bum): bya/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
183a5('bum): tshor ba las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gzhan du'ang btsal
183a6('bum): bar mi bya'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
183a7('bum): kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
183b1('bum): ba gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang /
183b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni/ ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ gzugs
183b3('bum): med pa/ bltar med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha
183b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa ni/ sa'i khams las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ sa'i khams las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /chu'i khams las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ chu'i khams las gzhan du'ang btsal
183b5('bum): bar mi bya'o/ /me'i khams las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ me'i khams las gzhan du'ang btsal bar ma bya'o/ /rlung gi khams las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ rlung gi khams las gzhan du'ang btsal bar
183b6('bum): mi bya'o/ /nam mkha'i khams las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ nam mkha'i khams las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ rnam par shes pa'i
183b7('bum): khams las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar sa'i khams gang yin pa dang / chu'i khams gang yin pa dang / me'i khams gang yin pa dang / rlung gi khams
184a1('bum): gang yin pa dang / nam mkha'i khams gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
184a2('bum): phyin pa gang yin pa dang / btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni/ ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bltar med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ mtshan nyid
184a3('bum): gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ ma rig pa las kyang btsal bar mi bya/
184a4('bum): ma rig pa las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /'du byed las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ 'du byed las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /rnam par shes pa las kyang btsal bar mi bya/
184a5('bum): rnam par shes pa las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /ming dang gzugs las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ ming dang gzugs las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /skye mched drug las kyang
184a6('bum): btsal bar mi bya/ skye mched drug las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /reg pa las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ reg ba las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /tshor ba las kyang btsal bar mi bya/
184a7('bum): tshor ba las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /sred pa las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ sred pa las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /len pa las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ len pa las gzhan du'ang
184b1('bum): btsal bar mi bya'o/ /srid pa las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ srid pa las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /skye ba las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ skye ba las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /rga shi las
184b2('bum): kyang btsal bar mi bya/ rga shi las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar ma rig pa gang yin pa dang / 'du byed gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa gang
184b3('bum): phyin pa dang / ming dang gzugs gang yin pa dang / skye mched drug gang yin pa dang / reg pa gang yin pa dang / tshor ba gang yin pa dang / srid pa gang yin pa dang / len pa gang yin pa dang / srid pa gang
184b4('bum): yin pa dang / skye ba gang yin pa dang / rga shi gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams
184b5('bum): cad ni/ ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bltar med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang byang chub
184b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /tshul
184b7('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ bzod pa'i pha
185a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan
185a2('bum): du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
185a3('bum): pa las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /
185a4('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang
185a5('bum): yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag
185a6('bum): thams cad ni/ ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bltar med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan
185a7('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ nang stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ nang stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /phyi stong pa
185b1('bum): nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ phyi stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ phyi nang stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /stong pa
185b2('bum): nyid stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /chen po stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ chen po stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang
185b3('bum): btsal bar mi bya'o/ don dam pa stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ don dam pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya/
185b4('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ 'dus ma byas song pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /
185b5('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid las kyang btsal
185b6('bum): bar mi bya/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang
185b7('bum): btsal bar mi bya'o/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar
186a1('bum): mi bya/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid las gzhan
186a2('bum): du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar
186a3('bum): mi bya/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /dngos po
186a4('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar nang stong pa
186a5('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid gang
186a6('bum): yin pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa
186a7('bum): dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / mi dmigs
186b1('bum): pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang
186b2('bum): yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / btsal pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni/ ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bltar med
186b3('bum): pa/ thogs pa med pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ dran
186b4('bum): pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
186b5('bum): rnams gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni/ ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa
186b6('bum): pa'ang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bltar med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
186b7('bum): pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ yang dag par spong ba rnams las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ yang dag par spong ba rnams las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/
187a1('bum): 'di ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de
187a2('bum): dag thams cad ni/ ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bltar med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan
187a3('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams las gzhan du'ang
187a4('bum): btsal bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang
187a5('bum): yin pa dang / btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni/ ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bltar med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/
187a6('bum): 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ dbang po rnams las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ dbang po rnams
187a7('bum): las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar dbang po rnams gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
187b1('bum): pa gang yin pa dang / btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni/ ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bltar med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/
187b2('bum): 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ stobs rnams las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ stobs rnams
187b3('bum): las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar stobs rnams gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
187b4('bum): gang yin pa dang / btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni/ ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bltar med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa
187b5('bum): ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams las kyang btsal bar
187b6('bum): mi bya/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
187b7('bum): gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni/ ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bltar med pa/
188a1('bum): thogs pa med pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha
188a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
188a3('bum): kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / btsal ba gang yin
188a4('bum): pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni/ ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bltar med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /kau
188a5('bum): shi ka / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
188a6('bum): las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / shes rab
188a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni/ ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bltar med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ mtshan
188b1('bum): nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ bsam gtan rnams las kyang btsal
188b2('bum): bar mi bya/ bsam gtan rnams las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar bsam gtan rnams gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa
188b3('bum): dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni/ ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan ba'ang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bltar med pa/ thogs
188b4('bum): pa med pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ tshad med pa rnams
188b5('bum): las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ tshad med pa rnams las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar tshad med pa rnams gang yin pa
188b6('bum): dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni/ ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/
188b7('bum): gzugs med pa/ bltar med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi
189a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug ba rnams las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug ba rnams las gzhan
189a2('bum): du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / shes
189a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni/ ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bltar med pa/ thogs
189a4('bum): pa med pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ rnam
189a5('bum): par thar pa rnams las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ rnam par thar pa rnams las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar rnam par thar pa rnams gang
189a6('bum): yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / btsal pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni/ ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi
189a7('bum): ldan pa'ang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bltar med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
189b1('bum): sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
189b2('bum): las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin
189b3('bum): pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni/ ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bltar med pa/ thogs
189b4('bum): pa med pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ rnam par thar
189b5('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa las kyang btsal par mi bya/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa las gzhan du'ang
189b6('bum): btsal bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
189b7('bum): gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni/ ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan ba'ang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bltar
190a1('bum): med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes
190a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba ni/ mngon par shes pa rnams las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ mngon par shes pa rnams las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/
190a3('bum): 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams
190a4('bum): cad ni/ ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bltar med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /kau shi ka /
190a5('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ ting nge 'dzin rnams las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ ting nge 'dzin rnams las gzhan du'ang
190a6('bum): btsal bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
190a7('bum): gang yin pa dang / btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni/ ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bltar med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ mtshan nyid
190b1('bum): gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams las kyang btsal
190b2('bum): bar mi bya/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang
190b3('bum): yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni/ ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bltar med pa/
190b4('bum): thogs pa med pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ de bzhin
190b5('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar
190b6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag
190b7('bum): thams cad ni/ ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bltar med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /kau shi ka/
191a1('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ mi 'jigs pa rnams las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ mi 'jigs
191a2('bum): pa rnams las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar mi 'jigs pa rnams gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / shes
191a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni/ ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bltar med pa/ thogs
191a4('bum): pa med pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ so so
191a5('bum): yang dag par reg pa rnams las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar so
191a6('bum): so yang dag par rig pa rnams gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni/
191a7('bum): ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bltar med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang byang chub
191b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ byams pa chen po las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ byams pa chen po las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
191b2('bum): kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar byams pa chen po gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag
191b3('bum): thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bltar med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan
191b4('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ snying rje chen po las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ snying rje chen po las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
191b5('bum): kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar snying rje chen po gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams
191b6('bum): cad ni/ ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bltar med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang byang
191b7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ sangs rgyas kyi tshos ma 'dres pa rnams las
192a1('bum): gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin
192a2('bum): pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni/ ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bltar med pa/ thogs
192a3('bum): pa med pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ thams cad
192a4('bum): shes pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ thams cad shes pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar thams cad shes pa nyid gang yin
192a5('bum): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni/ ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang
192a6('bum): ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bltar med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /kau shi ka /gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
192a7('bum): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
192b1('bum): kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de
192b2('bum): dag thams cad ni/ ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bltar med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /kau shi ka/
192b3('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
192b4('bum): las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / shes rab
192b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni/ ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bltar med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ mtshan nyid
192b6('bum): gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar gzugs kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ gzugs las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
192b7('bum): pa med do/ /gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang shes
193a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /tshor ba'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/
193a2('bum): tshor ba las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol
193a3('bum): tu phyin pa med do/ /tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ tshor ba'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /'du shes kyang shes rab kyi pha
193a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'du shes las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'du shes kyi de
193a5('bum): bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /'du shes kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'du shes kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes
193a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /'du byed kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'du byed las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes
193a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /'du byed kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'du
193b1('bum): byed kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rnam par shes pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
193b2('bum): phyin pa med do/ /rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rnam par
193b3('bum): shes pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mig kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma
193b4('bum): yin/ mig las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mig gi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mig gi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha
193b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mig gi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mig gi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rna ba'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
193b6('bum): phyin pa ma yin/ rna ba las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rna ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rna ba'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab
193b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rna ba'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rna ba'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /sna'ang shes rab kyi pha rol
194a1('bum): tu phyin pa ma yin/ sna las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /sna'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ sna'i de bzhin nyid las gud
194a2('bum): na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /sna'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ sna'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /lce'ang shes
194a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ lce las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /lce'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ lce'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang
194a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /lce'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ lce'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /lus kyang shes rab
194a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ lus las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ lus kyi de bzhin nyid las gud
194a6('bum): na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /lus kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ lus kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /yid kyang
194a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ /yid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /yid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ yid kyi de bzhin nyid
194b1('bum): las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ / yid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ yid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /gzugs
194b2('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ gzugs las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi de
194b3('bum): bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
194b4('bum): med do/ /sgra'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ sgra las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /sgra'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ sgra'i de bzhin nyid
194b5('bum): las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /sgra'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ sgra'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /dri'ang
194b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dri las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /dri'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dri'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang
194b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /dri'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dri'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /ro'ang shes rab kyi pha rol
195a1('bum): tu phyin pa ma yin/ ro las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /ro'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ ro'i de bzhin nyid
195a2('bum): las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /ro'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ ro'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med
195a3('bum): do/ /reg kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ reg las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /reg gi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma
195a4('bum): yin/ reg gi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /reg gi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ reg gi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes
195a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /chos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ chos las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /chos kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha
195a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /chos kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ chos kyi chos nyid
195a7('bum): las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mig gi rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha
195b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
195b2('bum): phyin pa med do/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med
195b3('bum): do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin
195b4('bum): nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang
195b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
195b6('bum): pa ma yin/ sna'i rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ sna'i rnam par
195b7('bum): shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i chos
196a1('bum): nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ lce'i rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang
196a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang
196a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes
196a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med
196a5('bum): do/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
196a6('bum): med do/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
196a7('bum): med do/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /yid kyi rnam par
196b1('bum): shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /yid kyi rnam par shes
196b2('bum): pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang shes
196b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
196b4('bum): phyin pa ma yin/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
196b5('bum): pa ma yin/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rna
196b6('bum): ba'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg
196b7('bum): pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid
197a1('bum): las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang shes
197a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol
197a3('bum): tu phyin pa med do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /lce'i

197a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
197a6('bum): phyin pa ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ lus kyi
197a7('bum): 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de
197b1('bum): bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang
197b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med
197b3('bum): do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /
197b4('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mig gi 'dus
197b5('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mig gi 'dus te
197b6('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
197b7('bum): med do/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes
198a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
198a2('bum): tshor ba las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rna ba'i 'dus te reg
198a3('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
198a4('bum): phyin pa ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang
198a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i
198a6('bum): de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /sna'i 'dus te

198b1('bum): med do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /

198b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa med do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid las gud
198b4('bum): na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
198b5('bum): las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus
198b6('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol
198b7('bum): tu phyin pa ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang
199a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /yid kyi
199a2('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid las gud
199a3('bum): na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te
199a4('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/
199a5('bum): bam po brgya bcu gsum pa/ /sa'i khams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ sa'i khams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /sa'i khams kyi de
199a6('bum): bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /sa'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang
199a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ sa'i khams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /chu'i khams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma
199b1('bum): yin/ chu'i khams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud
199b2('bum): na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /chu'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ chu'i khams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
199b3('bum): phyin pa med do/ /me'i khams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ me'i khams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes
