199b6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//
199b7('bum): rlung gi khams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rlung gi khams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /nam mkha'i khams kyang
200a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ nam mkha'i khams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes
200a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
200a3('bum): phyin pa ma yin/ nam mkha'i khams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/
200a4('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/
200a5('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma
200a6('bum): yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /ma rig pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ ma rig pa
200a7('bum): las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes
200b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /ma rig pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ ma rig pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /'du byed kyang
200b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'du byed las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'du
200b3('bum): byed kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /'du byed kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'du byed kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang
200b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rnam par shes pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /
200b5('bum): rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rnam par
200b6('bum): shes pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /ming dang gzugs kyang shes rab kyi pha
200b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ ming dang gzugs las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ ming
201a1('bum): dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /ming dang gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
201a2('bum): phyin pa ma yin/ ming dang gzugs kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /skye mched drug kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ skye
201a3('bum): mched drug las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid
201a4('bum): las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /skye mched drug gi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ skye mched drug gi chos nyid las gud na'ang
201a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /reg pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ reg pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /reg pa'i
201a6('bum): de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ reg pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /reg pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab
201a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ reg pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /tshor ba'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ tshor ba
201b1('bum): las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi
201b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ tshor ba'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /sred
201b3('bum): pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ sred pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /sred pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/
201b4('bum): sred pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /sred pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ sred pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang
201b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /len pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ len pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /len pa'i de bzhin
201b6('bum): nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ len pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /len pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
201b7('bum): pa ma yin/ len pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /srid pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ srid pa las gud na'ang shes rab
202a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /srid pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ srid pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes
202a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /srid pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ srid pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
202a3('bum): med do/ /skye ba'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ skye ba las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /skye ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi
202a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ skye ba'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /skye ba'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma
202a5('bum): yin/ skye ba'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rga shi'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rga shi las gud na'ang shes
202a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rga shi'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rga shi'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
202a7('bum): med do/ /rga shi'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rga shi'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /sbyin pa'i pha
202b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
202b2('bum): phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
202b3('bum): med do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes
202b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang
202b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
202b6('bum): pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/
202b7('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
203a1('bum): phyin pa ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol
203a2('bum): tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
203a3('bum): med do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes
203a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las
203a5('bum): gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ brtson 'grus
203a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha
203a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
203b1('bum): phyin pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /bsam gtan
203b2('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi
203b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos
203b4('bum): nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
203b5('bum): phyin pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ shes
203b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol
203b7('bum): tu phyin pa ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /nang stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol
204a1('bum): tu phyin pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes
204a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang
204a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyang shes
204a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes
204a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab
204a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha
204a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
204b1('bum): phyin pa ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
204b2('bum): pa ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ stong
204b3('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid
204b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/
204b5('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ chen po
204b6('bum): stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi
204b7('bum): de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi chos
205a1('bum): nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ don
205a2('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/
205a3('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol
205a4('bum): tu phyin pa ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang shes rab
205a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang
205a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /'dus byas stong pa
205a7('bum): nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /
205b1('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /'dus ma
205b2('bum): byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
205b3('bum): med do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha
205b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes
205b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong
205b6('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
205b7('bum): pa ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
206a1('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med
206a2('bum): do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las
206a3('bum): gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ thog ma dang
206a4('bum): tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma
206a5('bum): yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol
206a6('bum): tu phyin pa ma yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid
206a7('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rang bzhin stong
206b1('bum): pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang
206b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid
206b3('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang
206b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin
206b5('bum): nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /chos thams
206b6('bum): cad stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /
206b7('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rang gi mtshan
207a1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes
207a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos
207a3('bum): nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid
207a4('bum): las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mi dmigs pa stong
207a5('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mi dmigs
207a6('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dngos
207a7('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/
207b1('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol
207b2('bum): tu phyin pa ma yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
207b3('bum): phyin pa ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
207b4('bum): ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
207b5('bum): phyin pa ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol
207b6('bum): tu phyin pa ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha
207b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid
208a1('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /dran pa nye
208a2('bum): bar gzhag pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi de
208a3('bum): bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
208a4('bum): rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /yang dag par spong
208a5('bum): ba rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin
208a6('bum): nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams
208a7('bum): kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
208b1('bum): rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes
208b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab
208b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /dbang po rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/
208b4('bum): dbang po rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud
208b5('bum): na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /dbang po rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dbang po rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol
208b6('bum): tu phyin pa med do/ /stobs rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ stobs rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang
208b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /stobs rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
209a1('bum): pa ma yin/ stobs rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
209a2('bum): phyin pa ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
209a3('bum): phyin pa ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab
209a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang
209a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de
209a6('bum): bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /'phags pa'i lam
209a7('bum): yan lag brgyad pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /'phags
209b1('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin
209b2('bum): nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang
209b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /bsam gtan rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma
209b4('bum): yin/ bsam gtan rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ bsam gtan rnams kyi de
209b5('bum): bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /bsam gtan rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ bsam gtan rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang
209b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /tshad med pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ tshad med pa rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /tshad med pa
209b7('bum): rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ tshad med pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /tshad med pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang
210a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ tshad med pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
210a2('bum): 'jug pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /gzugs med pa'i
210a3('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha
210a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa med do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos
210a5('bum): nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rnam par thar pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha
210a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rnam par thar pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
210a7('bum): phyin pa med do/ /rnam par thar pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /
210b1('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
210b2('bum): pa med do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid
210b3('bum): las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
210b4('bum): par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
210b5('bum): phyin pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
210b6('bum): med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang
210b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo
211a1('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyang shes
211a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
211a3('bum): phyin pa ma yin/ mngon bar shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
211a4('bum): ma yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams
211a5('bum): las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang
211a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
211a7('bum): pa med do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin
211b1('bum): nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha
211b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/
211b3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ de
211b4('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma
211b5('bum): yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mi 'jigs pa
211b6('bum): rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang
211b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
212a1('bum): pa med do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol
212a2('bum): tu phyin pa med do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi
212a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha
212a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa med do/ /snying rje chen po'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ snying rje chen po las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes
212a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /snying rje chen po'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ snying
212a6('bum): rje chen po'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
212a7('bum): pa rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
212b1('bum): 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas
212b2('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /thams cad shes pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ thams cad shes pa nyid
212b3('bum): las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /thams cad shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud
212b4('bum): na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /thams cad shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ thams cad shes ba nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha
212b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa med do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /lam gyi
212b6('bum): rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /lam gyi rnam
212b7('bum): pa shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rnam pa thams cad
213a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rnam pa thams
213a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /
213a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
213a4('bum): med do/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po brgya bcu bzhi pa/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar chos de dag thams cad
213a5('bum): med cing mi dmigs pa ste/ de ltar chos thams cad med cing mi dmigs pas na/ gzugs kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ gzugs las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol
213a6('bum): tu phyin pa med do/ /gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /gzugs kyi
213a7('bum): chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /tshor ba'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/
213b1('bum): tshor ba las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi
213b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ tshor ba'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /'du shes kyang shes
213b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'du shes las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'du shes kyi de
213b4('bum): bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /'du shes kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'du shes kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha
213b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa med do/ /'du byed kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'du byed las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha
213b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /'du byed kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'du byed kyi chos
213b7('bum): nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rnam par shes pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
214a1('bum): med do/ /rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
214a2('bum): med do/ /rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mig kyang shes rab kyi
214a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mig las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mig gi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mig gi de bzhin nyid las gud
214a4('bum): na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mig gi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mig gi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rna ba'ang
214a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rna ba las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rna ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rna ba'i de bzhin nyid
214a6('bum): las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rna ba'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rna ba'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /
214a7('bum): sna'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ sna las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /sna'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ sna'i de bzhin nyid las
214b1('bum): gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /sna'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ sna'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ / lce'ang shes rab
214b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ lce las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /lce'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ lce'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab
214b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /lce'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ lce'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /lus kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
214b4('bum): ma yin/ lus las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ lus kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol
214b5('bum): tu phyin pa med do/ /lus kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ lus kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /yid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma
214b6('bum): yin/ yid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /yid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ yid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
214b7('bum): pa med do/ /yid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ yid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /gzugs kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/
215a1('bum): gzugs las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi de bzhin
215a2('bum): nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
215a3('bum): phyin pa med do/ /sgra'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ sgra las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /sgra'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ sgra'i
215a4('bum): de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /sgra'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ sgra'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
215a5('bum): med do/ /dri'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dri las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /dri'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dri'i de bzhin
215a6('bum): nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /dri'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dri'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /
215a7('bum): ro'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ ro las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /ro'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ ro'i de bzhin nyid las
215b1('bum): gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /ro'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ ro'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ / reg kyang shes rab
215b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ reg las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /reg gi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ reg gi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang
215b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /reg gi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ reg gi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /chos kyang shes rab kyi pha
215b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ chos las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /chos kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab
215b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /chos kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ chos kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang
215b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mig gi rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
215b7('bum): ma yin/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mig gi
216a1('bum): rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rna ba'i rnam
216a2('bum): par shes pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid
216a3('bum): las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes
216a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ sna'i rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /sna'i rnam
216a5('bum): par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /sna'i rnam par shes
216a6('bum): pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa'ang shes rab kyi
216a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ lce'i rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/

216b2('bum): pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha

221a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /reg pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ reg pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /tshor ba'ang shes rab
221b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ tshor ba las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid las gud
221b2('bum): na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ tshor ba'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /sred pa'ang
221b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ sred pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /sred pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ sred pa'i de bzhin nyid
221b4('bum): las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /sred pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ sred pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /
221b5('bum): len pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ len pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /len pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ len pa'i
221b6('bum): de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /len pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ len pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
221b7('bum): phyin pa med do/ /srid pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ srid pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /srid pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma
222a1('bum): yin/ srid pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /srid pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ srid pa'i
222a2('bum): chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /skye ba'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ skye ba las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /skye ba'i
222a3('bum): de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ skye ba'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /skye ba'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
222a4('bum): pa ma yin/ skye ba'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rga shi'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rga shi las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
222a5('bum): phyin pa med do/ /rga shi'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rga shi'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rga shi'i chos nyid
222a6('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rga shi'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma
222a7('bum): yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ sbyin
222b1('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha
222b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
222b3('bum): las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin
222b4('bum): nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos
222b5('bum): nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang shes
222b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang
222b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes
223a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang shes
223a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang
223a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin ba'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes
223a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med
223a5('bum): do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med
223a6('bum): do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /
223a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de
223b1('bum): bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos
223b2('bum): nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /nang stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma
223b3('bum): yin/ nang stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud
223b4('bum): na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
223b5('bum): med do/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol
223b6('bum): tu phyin pa ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ phyi stong pa
223b7('bum): nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
224a1('bum): phyin pa med do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi
224a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /
224a3('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
224a4('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab
224a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/
224a6('bum): chen po stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi de
224a7('bum): bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las
224b1('bum): gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med
224b2('bum): do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /don
224b3('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid
224b4('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
224b5('bum): phyin pa ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/
224b6('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
224b7('bum): las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
225a1('bum): las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas
225a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa
225a3('bum): stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa
225a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mtha'
225a5('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ thog ma dang
225a6('bum): tha ma med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ thog ma
225a7('bum): dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/
225b1('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dor ba med pa stong
225b2('bum): pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
225b3('bum): las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang
225b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rang
225b5('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rang bzhin stong pa
225b6('bum): nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang shes
225b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha
226a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi chos
226a2('bum): nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang shes
226a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha
226a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha
226a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma
226a6('bum): yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mi dmigs
226a7('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mi dmigs
226b1('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid las
226b2('bum): gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
226b3('bum): las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las
226b4('bum): gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
226b5('bum): phyin pa med do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
226b6('bum): pa med do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /dngos
226b7('bum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /dngos
227a1('bum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las
227a2('bum): gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
227a3('bum): pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag
227a4('bum): pa rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dran pa nye
227a5('bum): bar gzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
227a6('bum): ma yin| dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
227a7('bum): phyin pa ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol
227b1('bum): tu phyin pa ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha
227b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
227b3('bum): phyin pa ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma
227b4('bum): yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
227b5('bum): ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /dbang po rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dbang po rnams
227b6('bum): las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang
227b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /dbang po rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dbang po rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
228a1('bum): phyin pa med do/ /stobs rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ stobs rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med
228a2('bum): do/ /stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /stobs
228a3('bum): rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ stobs rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
228a4('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid
228a5('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
228a6('bum): kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /'phags pa'i lam
228a7('bum): yan lag brgyad pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /'phags
228b1('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha
228b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa med do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i chos nyid las gud
228b3('bum): na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol
228b4('bum): tu phyin pa med do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha
228b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa med do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha
228b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa med do/ /bsam gtan rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ bsam gtan rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /bsam gtan
228b7('bum): rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /bsam gtan rnams kyi
229a1('bum): chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ bsam gtan rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /tshad med
229a2('bum): pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ tshad med pa rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /tshad med pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi
229a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ tshad med pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /tshad med pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
229a4('bum): phyin pa ma yin/ tshad med pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
229a5('bum): pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang
229a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /gzugs med pa'i
229a7('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha
229b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rnam par thar pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ rnam par thar pa rnams
229b2('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rnam par thar pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang
229b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang shes
229b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
229b5('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mthar
229b6('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes
229b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
230a1('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / /mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa
230a2('bum): med pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi
230a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
230a4('bum): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma
230a5('bum): yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mngon par
230a6('bum): shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mngon par shes pa
230a7('bum): rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha
230b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa med do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /ting
230b2('bum): nge 'dzin rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang shes rab
230b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ gzungs
230b4('bum): kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi chos nyid
230b5('bum): las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams las gud na'ang
230b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid
230b7('bum): las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi chos
231a1('bum): nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mi 'jigs pa rnams las gud na'ang shes
231a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
231a3('bum): pa med do/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /so so yang dag
231a4('bum): par rig pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de
231a5('bum): bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
231a6('bum): kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /byams pa chen po'ang shes rab kyi
231a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ byams pa chen po las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ byams pa chen
231b1('bum): po'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /byams pa chen po'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ byams pa chen po'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes
231b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /snying rje chen po'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ snying rje chen po las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid kyang
231b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /snying rje chen po'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ snying
231b4('bum): rje chen po'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
231b5('bum): rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
231b6('bum): rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
231b7('bum): 'dres pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /thams cad shes pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ thams cad shes pa nyid las gud na'ang
232a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /thams cad shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las
232a2('bum): gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /thams cad shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes
232a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /
232a4('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /
232a5('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rnam pa
232a6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
232a7('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
232b1('bum): pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do// //shes rab kyi pha rol
232b2('bum): tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po brgya bco lnga pa/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
232b3('bum): chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ che ba ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ tshad
232b4('bum): ma med pa ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ tshad med pa ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi
232b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ mtha' yas pa ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /de la
232b6('bum): bslab cing rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyis ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyis ni/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
232b7('bum): thob bo/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyis ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa rnams kyis ni/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob
233a1('bum): bo/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni rang byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par sangs rgyas
233a2('bum): par 'gyur ro/ /de la bslab cing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ sems can yongs su smin par byas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas nas bla na med pa
233a3('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis
