290b7('bum): tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /kau shi ka/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
291a1('bum): tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i
291a2('bum): tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa tshad
291a3('bum): med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /kau shi ka/ thams cad shes pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
291a4('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar thams cad shes pa nyid kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/
291a5('bum): dper na/ nam mkha'i tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin du thams cad shes pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir thams cad shes pa nyid tshad
291a6('bum): med do/ /thams cad shes pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /kau shi ka/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
291a7('bum): chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/
291b1('bum): nam mkha'i tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid tshad med
291b2('bum): do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /kau shi ka/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
291b3('bum): chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/
291b4('bum): nam mkha'i tshad ni/ dmigs su med do/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tshad
291b5('bum): med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ /kau shi ka/ rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu
291b6('bum): phyin pa de ni/ tshad med pa ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po brgya bco brgyad pa/ /kau shi ka/ gzugs
291b7('bum): mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar gzugs kyi mtha' dang dbus mi
292a1('bum): dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ tshor ba mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau
292a2('bum): shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar tshor ba'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ 'du shes mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
292a3('bum): mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar 'du shes kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ 'du byed mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
292a4('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar 'du byed kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ rnam par shes pa
292a5('bum): mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i mtha'
292a6('bum): dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ mig mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi
292a7('bum): ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar mig gi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ rna ba mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas
292b1('bum): pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar rna ba'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ sna mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin
292b2('bum): pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar sna'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ lce mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
292b3('bum): rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar lce'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ lus mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
292b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar lus kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ yid mtha' yas pa'i
292b5('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar yid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau
292b6('bum): shi ka/ gzugs mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar gzugs
292b7('bum): kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ sgra mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau
293a1('bum): shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar sgra'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ dri mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
293a2('bum): 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar dri'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ ro mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
293a3('bum): rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar ro'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ reg mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub
293a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar reg gi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/
293a5('bum): chos mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar chos kyi mtha' dang
293a6('bum): dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ mig gi rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i
293a7('bum): phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar mig gi rnam par shes pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
293b1('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ sna'i rnam par
293b2('bum): shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar sna'i rnam par
293b3('bum): shes pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ lce'i rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas
293b4('bum): pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar lce'i rnam par shes pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems
293b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau
293b6('bum): shi ka/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di
293b7('bum): ltar yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu
294a1('bum): phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ rna ba'i 'dus te
294a2('bum): reg pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar rna ba'i 'dus te
294a3('bum): reg pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa
294a4('bum): ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
294a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni 'di ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ lus
294a6('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar lus
294a7('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
294b1('bum): mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' yas
294b2('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
294b3('bum): tshor ba'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin
294b4('bum): phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
294b5('bum): tshor ba mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i
294b6('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin
294b7('bum): pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ lus kyi 'dus te reg
295a1('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/
295a2('bum): de ni/ 'di ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems
295a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni 'di ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtha' dang dbus
295a4('bum): mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ sa'i khams mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi
295a5('bum): ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar sa'i khams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ chu'i khams mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin
295a6('bum): pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar chu'i khams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ me'i khams mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems
295a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar me'i khams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/
295b1('bum): rlung gi khams mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar rlung gi khams kyi
295b2('bum): mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ nam mkha'i khams mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i
295b3('bum): phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ rnam par shes pa'i khams mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
295b4('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ ma
295b5('bum): reg pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar ma rig pa'i mtha'
295b6('bum): dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ 'du byed mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi
295b7('bum): ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar 'du byed kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
296a1('bum): 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ ming dang gzugs mtha' yas
296a2('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar ming dang gzugs kyi mtha' dang dbus
296a3('bum): mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ skye mched drug mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/
296a4('bum): de ni/ 'di ltar skye mched drug gi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ reg pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha'
296a5('bum): yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar reg pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka tshor ba mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
296a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar tshor ba'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ sred pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems
296a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar sred pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ len pa
296b1('bum): pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar len pa'i mtha' dang dbus
296b2('bum): mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ srid pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di
296b3('bum): ltar srid pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ skye ba mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
296b4('bum): kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar skye ba'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ rga shi mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa
296b5('bum): ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar rga shi'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
296b6('bum): rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
296b7('bum): phyin pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
297a1('bum): phyin pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha
297a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
297a3('bum): phyin pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi
297a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu
297a5('bum): phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
297a6('bum): mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu
297a7('bum): phyin pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ nang stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/
297b1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ phyi stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
297b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar phyi stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ phyi nang stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i
297b3('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs
297b4('bum): so/ /kau shi ka/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/
297b5('bum): 'di ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ chen po stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
297b6('bum): 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar chen po stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ don dam pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub
297b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /
298a1('bum): kau shi ka/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
298a2('bum): kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
298a3('bum): po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ mtha' las
298a4('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar
298a5('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
298a6('bum): po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ dor
298a7('bum): ba med pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar
298b1('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
298b2('bum): 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i
298b3('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi mtha'
298b4('bum): dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/
298b5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems
298b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /
298b7('bum): kau shi ka/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/
299a1('bum): de ni/ 'di ltar dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
299a2('bum): po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
299a3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar dngos po
299a4('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu
299a5('bum): phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ yang dag par spong ba mtha'
299a6('bum): yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams
299a7('bum): kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/
299b1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ dbang po mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
299b2('bum): po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar dbang po rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ stobs mtha' yas
299b3('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar stobs rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi
299b4('bum): dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ byang chub kyi yan lag mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi
299b5('bum): ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
299b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi
299b7('bum): dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ 'phags pa'i bden pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
300a1('bum): kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ bsam gtan mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
300a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar bsam gtan rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ tshad
300a3('bum): med pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar tshad med pa
300a4('bum): rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin
300a5('bum): pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ rnam par thar
300a6('bum): pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar rnam par thar pa rnams
300a7('bum): kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin
300b1('bum): pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ rnam par thar
300b2('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i
300b3('bum): phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ mngon par shes pa
300b4('bum): mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar mngon par shes pa
300b5('bum): rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ ting nge 'dzin mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de
300b6('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ gzungs kyi sgo mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
300b7('bum): chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka /de bzhin
301a1('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka
301a2('bum): de ni/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ mi 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
301a3('bum): rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ so so yang dag
301a4('bum): par rig pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni 'di ltar so so
301a5('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ / kau shi ka/ byams pa chen po mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin
301a6('bum): pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar byams pa chen po'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ snying rje chen po mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub
301a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar snying rje chen po'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /
301b1('bum): kau shi ka/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/
301b2('bum): de ni/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ thams cad shes pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
301b3('bum): chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar thams cad shes pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ lam gyi rnam
301b4('bum): pa shes pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar lam gyi
301b5('bum): rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin
301b6('bum): pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa'
301b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gzugs mtha' yas pa dang / tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang / 'du shes mtha' yas pa dang / 'du byed mtha' yas pa dang / rnam par shes
302a1('bum): pa mtha' yas pa dang / mig mtha' yas pa dang / rna ba mtha' yas pa dang / sna mtha' yas pa dang / lce mtha' yas pa dang / lus mtha' yas pa dang / yid mtha' yas
302a2('bum): pa dang / gzugs mtha' yas pa dang / sgra mtha' yas pa dang / dri mtha' yas pa dang / ro mtha' yas pa dang / reg mtha' yas pa dang / chos mtha' yas pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes
302a3('bum): pa mtha' yas pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes
302a4('bum): pa mtha' yas pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa
302a5('bum): mtha' yas pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
302a6('bum): tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
302a7('bum): tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' yas ba dang / sa'i khams mtha' yas pa
302b1('bum): dang / chu'i khams mtha' yas pa dang / me'i khams mtha' yas pa dang / rlung gi khams mtha' yas pa dang / nam mkha'i khams mtha' yas pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams mtha' yas
302b2('bum): pa dang / ma rig pa mtha' yas pa dang / 'du byed mtha' yas pa dang / rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang / ming dang gzugs mtha' yas pa dang / skye mched drug mtha' yas pa dang / reg
302b3('bum): pa mtha' yas pa dang / tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang / sred pa mtha' yas pa dang / len pa mtha' yas pa dang / srid pa mtha' yas pa dang / skye ba mtha' yas pa dang / rga shi mtha' yas pa
302b4('bum): dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
302b5('bum): phyin pa mtha' yas pa dang / /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa dang / nang stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid
302b6('bum): mtha' yas pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / 'dus
302b7('bum): byas stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / dor
303a1('bum): ba med pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mtha'
303a2('bum): yas pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
303a3('bum): nyid mtha' yas pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mtha' yas pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams mtha' yas pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mtha' yas pa dang / dbang po
303a4('bum): rnams mtha' yas pa dang / stobs rnams mtha' yas pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mtha' yas pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mtha' yas pa dang / 'phags
303a5('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams mtha' yas pa dang / bsam gtan rnams mtha' yas pa dang / tshad med pa rnams mtha' yas pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtha' yas
303a6('bum): pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad mtha' yas pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mtha' yas pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
303a7('bum): smon pa med pa mtha' yas pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams mtha' yas pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams mtha' yas pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams mtha' yas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
303b1('bum): pa'i stobs rnams mtha' yas pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi mtha' yas pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mtha' yas pa dang / byams pa chen po mtha' yas pa dang / snying rje chen po mtha'
303b2('bum): yas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mtha' yas pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mtha' yas pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mtha' yas pa dang / phyir mi
303b3('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mtha' yas pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / rang byang chub mtha' yas pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
303b4('bum): nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir mtha' yas pa ste/ de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
303b5('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ de rnam pa gang gis na
303b6('bum): dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin zhe bya/
303b7('bum): rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha'
304a1('bum): yas pa ste/ de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang chos dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
304a2('bum): chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ de rnam pa gang gis na chos dmigs
304a3('bum): pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin zhes bya/ rab 'byor
304a4('bum): gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka/ chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ni/ 'di ltar shes
304a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang de bzhin nyid dang dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha'
304a6('bum): yas pa ste/ de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa/ rab 'byor/ de rnam pa gang gis na dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub
304a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin zhes bya/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka/ de ni/
304b1('bum): 'di ltar de bzhin nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir dmigs pa mtha' yas so/ /dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir de bzhin nyid mtha' yas so/ /ko shi ka/ de bzhin nyid dang dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i
304b2('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas so/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
304b3('bum): chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas so/ /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de rnam pa gang gis na/ sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
304b4('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa yin zhes bya/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka/ de ji snyam du sems/ 'di lta ste/ sems can sems can zhes bya ba de chos
304b5('bum): gang gi tshig bla dgas yin/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ de ni/ chos kyi tshig bla dgas kyang ma yin/ chos ma yin pa'i tshig bla dgas kyang ma yin te/ 'di ltar sems can
304b6('bum): sems can zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du ming du btags pa/ dngos po med par ming du btags pa/ dmigs pa med par ming du btags pa'o/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka/ de ji snyam
304b7('bum): du sems/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las sems can du bshad pa gang yang yod dam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ de ni/ med do/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi
305a1('bum): ka/ gang la sems can du bshad pa gang yang med pa de la/ sems can mtha' yas pa ci zhig yod de/ kau shi ka/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
305a2('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bzhugs te/ sems can sems can zhes gsung du brjod na/ kau shi ka/ de ji snyam du sems/ de la sems can gang
305a3('bum): yang skye ba'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ba yod dam/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ de ni/ med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can thog ma nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis smras
305a4('bum): pa/ kau shi ka/ de ltar rnam grangs des na/ sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /de nas dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang /
305a5('bum): tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / skye rgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / skyes pa dang bud med du bcas pa dag gis lan gsum du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod de gang gnas
305a6('bum): brtan rab 'byor gyis 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus bshad cing brjod de bstan pa'i chos 'di
305a7('bum): ni/ kye ma legs par bshad do/ /kye ma chos 'di legs par bshad do/ /kye ma chos kyi chos nyid ni/ legs par bshad do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa'
305b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang ma bral ba de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du gzung bar bgyi'o/ /chos gang yang dmigs su ma mchis te/ gzugs sam/ tshor
305b2('bum): ba'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa'am/ mig gam/ rna ba'am/ sna'am/ lce 'am/ lus sam/ yid dam/ gzugs sam/ sgra'am/ dri 'am/ ro 'am/ reg gam/
305b3('bum): chos sam/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'am/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'am/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'am/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'am/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'am/ yid kyi rnam par
305b4('bum): shes pa'am/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'am/
305b5('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am/
305b6('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am/ sa'i khams sam/ chu'i khams sam/ me'i khams sam/ rlung gi khams sam/ nam
305b7('bum): mkha'i khams sam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams sam/ ma rig pa'am/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa'am/ ming dang gzugs sam/ skye mched drug gam/ reg pa'am/ tshor ba'am/

312a6('bum): kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro/ /zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/ /de nas lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
312a7('bum): ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di de ltar gzugs mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / tshor
312b1('bum): ba mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / 'du shes mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / 'du byed mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / mig mi len mi 'dor

312b5('bum): len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i
312b6('bum): tshul dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te
312b7('bum): reg pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
313a1('bum): tshor ba mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi len mi
313a2('bum): 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus
313a3('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / sa'i khams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / chu'i khams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / me'i khams mi len mi 'dor
313a4('bum): ba'i tshul dang / rlung gi khams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / nam mkha'i khams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / ma rig pa
313a5('bum): mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / 'du byed mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / ming dang gzugs mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / skye mched
313a6('bum): drug mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / reg pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / tshor ba mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / sred pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / len pa mi len mi 'dor
313a7('bum): ba'i tshul dang / srid pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / skye ba mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rga shi mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i
313b1('bum): tshul dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul
313b2('bum): dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / nang stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / phyi
313b3('bum): stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / chen po stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor
313b4('bum): ba'i tshul dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /
313b5('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /
313b6('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / mi dmigs
313b7('bum): pa stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
314a1('bum): stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul
314a2('bum): dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / dbang po rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / stobs rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
314a3('bum): mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / bsam gtan
314a4('bum): rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / tshad med pa rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rnam
314a5('bum): par thar pa rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
314a6('bum): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / mngon par shes pa rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / gzungs
314a7('bum): kyi sgo rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / so so
314b1('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / byams pa chen po mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / snying rje chen po mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
314b2('bum): 'dres pa rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / thams cad shes pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rnam pa thams cad
314b3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang mthun par yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ ngo mtshar che'o/ /de
314b4('bum): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor bzhi dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris
314b5('bum): kyi lha'i bu dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i bu dang / mtshe ma'i lha'i bu dang / dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu dang / 'phrul dga'i lha'i bu dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu dang / tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu
314b6('bum): dang / tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha'i bu dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha'i bu dang / tshangs chen gyi lha'i bu dang / snang ba'i lha'i bu dang / chung snang gi lha'i bu dang / tshad med snang ba'i lha'i bu dang / kun
314b7('bum): snang dang ba'i lha'i bu dang / dge ba'i lha'i bu dang / chung dge'i lha'i bu dang / tshad med dge ba'i lha'i bu dang / dge rgyas kyi lha'i bu dang / che ba'i lha'i bu dang / chung che'i lha'i bu dang / tshad med che
315a1('bum): ba'i lha'i bu dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha'i bu dang / mi che ba'i lha'i bu dang / mi gdung ba'i lha'i bu dang / shin tu mthong ba'i lha'i bu dang / gya nom snang ba'i lha'i bu dang /
315a2('bum): 'og min gyi lha'i bu de dag 'dus shing tshogs par mkhyen nas de dag thams cad dbang du btsugs te lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
315a3('bum): dpa' chen po 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ lha'i bu'am/ lha'i bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha
315a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / sgom pa dang / gzhan la rgya cher 'chad pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing rnam pa thams
315a5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang mi 'bral ba de dag ni/ bdud sdig can dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar
315a6('bum): rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis gzugs stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ 'du shes stong
315a7('bum): pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ 'du byed stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro//
315b1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed/ mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glags mi rnyed do/ /
315b2('bum): de ni/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis mig stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rna ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ sna stong pa nyid
315b3('bum): shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lce stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lus stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ yid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis
315b4('bum): brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed/ mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon pa
315b5('bum): med pa la glags mi rnyed do/ /de ni/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis gzugs stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ sgra stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis
315b6('bum): brlabs par 'gyur/ dri stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ ro stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ reg stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/
315b7('bum): chos stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed/ mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags
316a1('bum): mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glags mi rnyed do/ /de ni/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid shin
316a2('bum): tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lce'i
316a3('bum): rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid
316a4('bum): shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed/ mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed/ smon pa
316a5('bum): med pas smon pa med pa la glags mi rnyed do/ /de ni/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rna
316a6('bum): ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid shin tu
316a7('bum): byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro//
316b1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed/ mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glags mi rnyed do//
316b2('bum): de ni/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
316b3('bum): tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
316b4('bum): tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
316b5('bum): gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed/ mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa
316b6('bum): la glags mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glags mi rnyed do/ /de ni/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/ sa'i khams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par
316b7('bum): 'gyur/ chu'i khams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ me'i khams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rlung gi khams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis
317a1('bum): brlabs par 'gyur/ nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par
317a2('bum): 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed/ mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la
317a3('bum): glags mi rnyed do/ /de ni/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis ma rig pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ 'du byed stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs
317a4('bum): par 'gyur/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ ming dang gzugs stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ skye mched drug stong pa nyid
317a5('bum): shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ reg pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ sred pa stong pa nyid shin
317a6('bum): tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ len pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ srid pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ skye ba stong pa nyid shin tu
317a7('bum): byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rga shi stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed/ mtshan
317b1('bum): ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glags mi rnyed do/ /de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
317b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid shin tu
317b3('bum): byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs
317b4('bum): par 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed/ mtshan
317b5('bum): ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glags mi rnyed do/ /de ni/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
317b6('bum): shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ stong pa nyid
317b7('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis
318a1('bum): brlabs par 'gyur/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par
318a2('bum): 'gyur/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ dor
318a3('bum): ba med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa
318a4('bum): nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis
318a5('bum): brlabs par 'gyur/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ dngos po
318a6('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed/ mtshan ma med pas
318a7('bum): mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glags mi rnyed do/ /de ni/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
318b1('bum): rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ yang dag par spong ba rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin
318b2('bum): gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ dbang po rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ stobs rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
318b3('bum): stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar stong pa
318b4('bum): nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed/ mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glags mi rnyed do/ /de ni/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang /
318b5('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ bsam gtan rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ tshad
318b6('bum): med pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rnam par thar
318b7('bum): pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rnam par thar
319a1('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ mngon par shes pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin
319a2('bum): gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ ting nge 'dzin rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /de
319a3('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed/ mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glags
319a4('bum): mi rnyed do/ /de ni/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ mi 'jigs
319a5('bum): pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ byams pa chen po stong pa nyid shin
319a6('bum): tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ snying rje chen po stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs
319a7('bum): par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed/ mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon
319b1('bum): pa med pa la glags mi rnyed do/ /de ni/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/ thams cad shes pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lam gyi rnam pa
319b2('bum): shes pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar
319b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed/ mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glags mi rnyed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di
319b4('bum): ltar gang gis glags rnyed par 'gyur pa dang / gang du glags rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / gang la glags rnyed par 'gyur pa de dag gi ngo bo nyid med do/ /kau shi ka/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs
319b5('bum): kyi bu mo de dag la ni/ mi 'am/ mi ma yin pa glags lta zhing glags 'tshol ba dag gis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo
319b6('bum): de dag gis de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir ro/ /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi
319b7('bum): bu mo de dag ni/ nyam nga ba mi spong pas dus byed par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de
320a1('bum): dag gis sems can thams cad la yang dag pa'i rim gros bsnyen bkur byas pa'i phyir ro/ /kau shi ka/ gang yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
320a2('bum): khams na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang / mtshe ma'i lha dang / dga' ldan gyi lha dang / 'phrul dga'i lha dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang /
320a3('bum): kun snang dang ba'i lha dang / dge rgyas kyi lha dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / lha'i bu
320a4('bum): gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ma thos pa dang / ma bzung ba dang / ma bcangs pa dang / kun chub par ma byas pa de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
320a5('bum): mnyan par bya'o/ /gzung bar bya'o/ /bcang bar bya'o/ /bklag par bya'o/ /kun chub par bya'o/ /tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems dang yang ma
320a6('bum): bral bar bya'o/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin cing / 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul
320a7('bum): bzhin du yid la byed cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems dang yang ma bral bar byed pa de dag ni/ khyim stong pa na 'dug kyang rung / bla gab med pa na 'dug kyang rung / lam gol
320b1('bum): ba na 'dug kyang rung ste/ 'jigs pa'am dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis nang stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu
320b2('bum): bsgoms so/ /phyi stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid de mi dmigs
320b3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so/ /chen po stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so/ /
320b4('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid de
320b5('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
320b6('bum): shin tu bsgoms so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so/ /rang gi
320b7('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid de
321a1('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
321a2('bum): nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so/ /de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi
321a3('bum): lha dang / mtshe ma'i lha dang / dga' ldan gyi lha dang / 'phrul dga'i lha dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang / tshangs ris kyi lha dang / kun snang dang pa'i lha dang / dge rgyas kyi lha
321a4('bum): dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag
321a5('bum): cag gis rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mos shing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul
321a6('bum): bzhin du yid la bgyid cing / gzhan la'ang rgya cher ston pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yid la bgyi ba dang mi 'bral ba de dag la rtag tu rgyun mi tshad par bsrung ba dang / bskyang
321a7('bum): ba dang / bskyab par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchis na/ sems can dmyal ba rnams kyang rgyun chad par 'gyur
321b1('bum): byol song gi skye gnas rnams kyang rgyun tshad par 'gyur/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams kyang rgyun tshad par 'gyur/ lha las phongs pa rnams kyang rgyun tshad par 'gyur/ mi las dbul ba rnams
321b2('bum): kyang rgyun chad par 'gyur/ nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'go ba'i nad thams cad kyang rgyun tshad cing 'jigs pa ma mchis par 'gyur/ mu ge'i zhugs ngam thams cad kyang rgyun chad par
321b3('bum): 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchis na/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ bsam gtan bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung
321b4('bum): bar 'gyur/ tshad med pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ mngon par shes pa lnga 'jig rten du
321b5('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du
321b6('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
321b7('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ stong pa
322a1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'dus
322a2('bum): byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ thog
322a3('bum): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/
322a4('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/
322a5('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/
322a6('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ dbang
322a7('bum): po lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ stobs lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
322b1('bum): pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ rnam par thar pa brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
322b2('bum): par 'jug pa dgu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ gzungs
322b3('bum): kyi sgo thams cad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/
322b4('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ byams pa chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ snying rje chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi
322b5('bum): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ thams cad shes pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/
322b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchis na/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba mchis par 'gyur/ bram ze'i
322b7('bum): rigs che zhing mtho ba mchis par 'gyur/ khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba mchis par 'gyur/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rnams mchis par 'gyur/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi
323a1('bum): lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ mtshe ma'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams mchis
323a2('bum): par 'gyur/ 'phrul dga'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ tshangs lha nye phan
323a3('bum): gyi lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ tshangs chen gyi lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ snang ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ chung
323a4('bum): snang gi lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ dge ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/

323a7('bum): mi gdung ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ 'og min gyi lha rnams mchis
323b1('bum): par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchis na/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mchis par 'gyur/ rgyun du zhugs pa mchis par 'gyur/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i
323b2('bum): 'bras bu mchis par 'gyur/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba mchis par 'gyur/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mchis par 'gyur/ phyir mi 'ong ba mchis par 'gyur/ dgra bcom pa nyid mchis

323b6('bum): dkon mchog 'byung bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la
323b7('bum): bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par bgyi'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kau shi ka/ de de bzhin
324a1('bum): no/ /de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod na/ sems can dmyal ba thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/ /byol song gi skye gnas
324a2('bum): thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/ /gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/ /lha las phongs pa thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/ /mi las dbul ba thams cad rgyun

325a1('bum): 'gyur ro/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dbang po lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur

325b1('bum): du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod na/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba yod par 'gyur ro/ /bram za'i rigs che zhing mtho ba yod par 'gyur ro/ /khyim bdag

325b7('bum): ro/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro/ /che ba'i lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro/ /tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro/ /'bras
326a1('bum): bu che ba'i lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro/ /mi che ba'i lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro/ /mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod par 'gyur
326a2('bum): ro/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro/ /'og min gyi lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod na/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod par
326a3('bum): 'gyur ro/ /rgyun du zhugs pa yod par 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod par 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba yod par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod par
326a4('bum): 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba yod par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yod par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa yod par 'gyur ro/ /rang byang chub yod par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas yod par 'gyur
326a5('bum): ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod na/ sems can yongs su smin pa yod par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa yod par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs
326a6('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yod par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas dkon mchog 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /
326a7('bum): chos dkon mchog 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dge 'dun dkon mchog 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de bas na/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems
326b1('bum): dpa' chen po la rim gror bya'o/ /bkur stir bya'o/ /phu dud du bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /rtag tu rgyun mi chad par de la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par bya'o/ /kau shi ka/ gang byang chub
326b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar sems pa de ni/ nga la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud
326b3('bum): du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar sems so/ /de bas na/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rim gror bya'o/ /bkur stir bya'o/ /phu
326b4('bum): dud du bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /rtag tu rgyun mi chad par de la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par bya'o/ /kau shi ka/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lta ste/ dper
326b5('bum): na/ 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ smyig ma'i tshal lam/ bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ 'od ma'i tshal lam/ rtsi skyang gi tshal lam/ 'bras kyi zhing ngam/ til gyi zhing bzhin du nyan thos dang / rang
326b6('bum): sangs rgyas kyis gang bar gyur la/ de dag la rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis nam 'tsho'i bar du yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa dang / bkur stir byas pa dang /
326b7('bum): phu dud du byas pa dang / mchod par byas pa bas/ gang la las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ma bral ba zhig la rim gror byas/ bkur
327a1('bum): stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ de ni/ de bas bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas de
327a2('bum): dag yod pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten
327a3('bum): du 'byung bar 'gyur ba ma yin gyi/ kau shi ka/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad 'jig rten du yod par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin

327a5('bum): gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rim gror bya'o/ /bkur stir bya'o/ /phu dud du bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /rtag tu rgyun mi chad par de la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang /

327a7('bum): pa/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
327b1('bum): tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag gis tshe 'di la 'thob pa'i yon tan 'di dag yongs su zin par 'gyur
327b2('bum): zhing sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyid pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bsnyen bkur ba'i slad du sangs rgyas
