375a6('bum): pa'i sgo gsum dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs
375a7('bum): pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / gzhan yang sangs rgyas
375b1('bum): kyi chos tshad med pa gang ji snyed shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i nang du 'dus pa de dag kyang gzung bar bya'o/ /bcang bar bya'o/ /bklag par bya'o/ /kun chub par bya'o/ /tshul
375b2('bum): bzhin du yid la bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag 'di ltar shes par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa sngon byang
375b3('bum): chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe'ang 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod
375b4('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid
375b5('bum): stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog
375b6('bum): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs
375b7('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong
376a1('bum): pa bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
376a2('bum): dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /
376a3('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo
376a4('bum): thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang /
376a5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po 'di dag dang / gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa dag la bslab par mdzad kyi/ bdag cag gis kyang de'i rjes su bslab
376a6('bum): par bya'o/ /'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ bdag cag gi ston pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyis chos gzhan tshad med pa'i bar du'ang bdag cag gi ston pa ste/ de ni/ sangs
376a7('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bstan pa'o/ /rang sangs rgyas dang / dgra bcom pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyis bstan
376b1('bum): pa'ang 'di yin te/ yang 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la slob slob pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob slob pa dang /
376b2('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob slob pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob slob pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob slob pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol
376b3('bum): tu phyin pa la slob slob pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob slob
376b4('bum): pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la slob slob
376b5('bum): pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / rang bzhin
376b6('bum): stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa
376b7('bum): dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag
377a1('bum): pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la slob slob pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / dbang po rnams la slob slob pa dang /
377a2('bum): stobs rnams la slob slob pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la slob slob pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la slob slob pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
377a3('bum): la slob slob pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la slob slob pa dang / tshad med pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la slob slob pa dang /
377a4('bum): rnam par thar pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa
377a5('bum): dang / smon pa med pa la slob slob pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la slob slob pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la slob slob pa dang / de
377a6('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la slob slob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / byams pa chen po la
377a7('bum): slob slob pa dang / snying rje chen po la slob slob pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / thams cad shes pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / lam gyi rnam
377b1('bum): pa shes pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob slob pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / phyir
377b2('bum): mi 'ong ba rnams dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyis kyang pha rol tu phyin par gyur to/ /pha rol tu phyin to/ /pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur ro/ zhes bya bar
377b3('bum): shes par 'gyur ro/ / kau shi ka/ de bas na/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs kyang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las
377b4('bum): 'das kyang rung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
377b5('bum): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye rgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
377b6('bum): phyin pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
377b7('bum): dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye rgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir
378a1('bum): zhe na/ kau shi ka/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten
378a2('bum): yin te/ /lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye rgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ bzod pa'i pha
378a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye rgu'i bar
378a4('bum): gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ nyan thos dang / rang
378a5('bum): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye rgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol
378a6('bum): tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
378a7('bum): chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye rgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis nang stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ nang
378b1('bum): stong pa nyid 'di ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye rgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /
378b2('bum): de dag gis phyi stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ phyi stong pa nyid 'di ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams
378b3('bum): cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye rgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis phyi nang stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ phyi nang stong pa nyid 'di ni/ nyan
378b4('bum): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye rgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis stong pa nyid
378b5('bum): stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi
378b6('bum): rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye rgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis chen po stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ chen po stong pa nyid 'di ni/ nyan thos
378b7('bum): dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye rgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis don dam pa
379a1('bum): stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ don dam pa stong pa nyid 'di ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'
379a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye rgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i
379a3('bum): phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'di ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang /
379a4('bum): mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye rgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'di ni/ nyan
379a5('bum): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye rgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de
379a6('bum): dag gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'di ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang /
379a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye rgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis thog ma dang tha ma med pa
379b1('bum): stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'di ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
379b2('bum): po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye rgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/
379b3('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'di ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye
379b4('bum): rgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'di ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang /
379b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye rgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid la
379b6('bum): brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'di ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams
379b7('bum): cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye rgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ rang gi
380a1('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha
380a2('bum): yin gyi skye rgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'di ni/ nyan thos dang / rang
380a3('bum): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye rgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis dngos po med pa stong
380a4('bum): pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'di ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
380a5('bum): thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye rgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ ngo bo
380a6('bum): nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye rgu'i bar gyi
380a7('bum): rten yin no/ /de dag gis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni/ nyan thos dang / rang
380b1('bum): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye rgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
380b2('bum): rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa 'di dag ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams
380b3('bum): cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye rgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis yang dag par spong ba rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ yang
380b4('bum): dag par spong ba 'di dag ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye rgu'i
380b5('bum): bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa 'di dag ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
380b6('bum): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye rgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis dbang po rnams la brten
380b7('bum): par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ dbang po 'di dag ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha
381a1('bum): dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye rgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis stobs rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ stobs 'di dag ni/
381a2('bum): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye rgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de
381a3('bum): dag gis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ byang chub kyi yan lag 'di dag ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang
381a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye rgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa

381a6('bum): po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye rgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau
381a7('bum): shi ka/ 'phags pa'i bden pa 'di dag ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi
381b1('bum): skye rgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis bsam gtan rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ bsam gtan 'di dag ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
381b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye rgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis tshad med pa rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i
381b3('bum): phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ tshad med pa 'di dag ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma
381b4('bum): yin gyi skye rgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
381b5('bum): 'jug pa 'di dag ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye rgu'i bar gyi rten
381b6('bum): yin no/ /de dag gis rnam par thar pa rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ rnam par thar pa 'di dag ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
381b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye rgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
382a1('bum): la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
382a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye rgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
382a3('bum): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'di dag ni/ nyan
382a4('bum): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye rgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis
382a5('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ mngon par shes pa 'di dag ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'
382a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye rgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis ting nge 'dzin rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir
382a7('bum): zhe na/ kau shi ka/ ting nge 'dzin 'di dag ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha
382b1('bum): ma yin gyi skye rgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ gzungs kyi sgo 'di dag ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang /
382b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye rgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
382b3('bum): la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs 'di dag ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
382b4('bum): thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye rgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis mi 'jigs pa rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ mi 'jigs
382b5('bum): pa 'di dag ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye rgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /
382b6('bum): de dag gis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ so so yang dag par rig pa 'di dag ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
382b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye rgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis snying rje chen po la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe
383a1('bum): na/ kau shi ka/ snying rje chen po 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang /
383a2('bum): mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye rgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
383a3('bum): 'dres pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye rgu'i
383a4('bum): bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis thams cad shes pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ thams cad shes pa nyid 'di ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
383a5('bum): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye rgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis lam gyi lam gyi rnam pa
383a6('bum): shes pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'di ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
383a7('bum): dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye rgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ /de dag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i
383b1('bum): phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'di ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha
383b2('bum): dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye rgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po brgya nyer gsum pa/ /kau shi ka/ rigs kyi
383b3('bum): bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i phyir rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar
383b4('bum): dpag tshad phyed pa byas te/ de la nam 'tsho'i bar du me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha
383b5('bum): rdzas kyi chos gos dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas/
383b6('bum): bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ kau shi ka/ de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/ brgya
383b7('bum): byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka/ de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu
384a1('bum): mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / gzhan
384a2('bum): la'ang rgya cher ston cing rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang mi 'bral la/ gong du me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs

384a4('bum): shi ka/ mchod rten gcig lta zhog gi /kau shi ka/ gal te rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod
384a5('bum): pa'i phyir 'dzam bu'i gling 'di rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pas yongs su bkang ste/ de dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du
384a6('bum): lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha

387a1('bum): bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka/ de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin par byed/ 'chang bar byed/ klog par byed/

387b6('bum): ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la rim gror bgyis pa dang / bkur stir bgyis pa dang / phu dud du bgyis pa dang / mchod

395b5('bum): smon pa med pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /gzungs
395b6('bum): kyi sgo rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar
395b7('bum): 'gyur ro/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /byams pa chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /snying rje chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar
396a1('bum): 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /thams cad shes pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /
396a2('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de srid du rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams
396a3('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du
396a4('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mtshe
396a5('bum): ma'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /
396a6('bum): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams 'jig rten
396a7('bum): du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /tshangs ba kun 'khor gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /snang ba'i lha rnams
396b1('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ chung snang gi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams
396b2('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /chung dge'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams

396b4('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /tshad med che ba'i lta rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mi che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten
396b5('bum): du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mi gdung ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams
396b6('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'og min gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba
396b7('bum): rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /byang
397a1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba yod do/ /bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yod do/ /chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba yod do/ /sems
397a2('bum): can yongs su smin pa yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa yod do/ /de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /
397a3('bum): sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / mtshe ma'i lha rnams dang / dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang / 'phrul dga'i lha rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs
397a4('bum): ris kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams dang / tshangs chen gyi lha rnams dang / snang ba'i lha rnams dang / chung snang gi lha
397a5('bum): rnams dang / tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams dang / dge ba'i lha rnams dang / chung dge'i lha rnams dang / tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams dang / dge rgyas
397a6('bum): kyi lha rnams dang / che ba'i lha rnams dang / chung che'i lha rnams dang / tshad med che ba'i lha rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams dang / mi che ba'i lha rnams dang / mi gdung ba'i lha
397a7('bum): rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams dang / gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha gang ji snyed yod pa de dag la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis smras pa/ grogs po dag/
397b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung bar bya'o/ /grogs pa dag/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bcang bar bya'o/ /grogs po dag/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glag par bya'o/ /grogs po
397b2('bum): dag/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun chub par bya'o/ /grogs po dag/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o/ /grogs po dag/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung
397b3('bum): ba dang / bcangs pa dang / bklag pa dang / kun chub par byas pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byas pas ni/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro/ /chos kyi tshul rgyun chad par mi
397b4('bum): 'gyur ro/ /dge 'dun gyi tshul rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro/ /grogs po dag/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun ma chad la/ grogs po dag/ chos kyi tshul rgyun ma chad de/ grogs po dag/ dge 'dun
397b5('bum): gyi tshul rgyun ma chad na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig

397b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar
398a1('bum): 'gyur ro/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten

398a3('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rang bzhin
398a4('bum): stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mi
398a5('bum): dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /
398a6('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams 'jig rten du

398b1('bum): 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams

399a1('bum): spyod pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'jig rten du 'byung
399a2('bum): bar 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rang byang chub 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bla
399a3('bum): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka/ khyod kyis shes rab
399a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zungs shig / chongs shig /lhogs shig /kun chub par gyis shig /kau shi ka/ khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig /
399a5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ nam lha ma yin rnams 'di snyam du sems shing / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang 'thab mo bya'o/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang tsham bsngal lo//
399a6('bum): snyam na/ de'i tshe kau shi ka/ khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yid kyis sems la kha ton gyis shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig dang / des lha ma yin gyi bsam pa de
399a7('bum): dag phyir nub par 'gyur te/ sems bskyed pa de dag slos shing rnam par 'phel bar mi 'gyur ro/ /lha'i bu dang / lha'i bu mo gang dag shi 'pho ba'i tshe nam bdag cag ngan song du skye bar
399b1('bum): mthong na'ang kau shi ka/ khyod kyis de dag gi mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha ton du gyis shig dang / de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / shes
399b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mos pas/ lha'i gnas de nyid du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pa ni/ de ltar don dang ldan pa ste/
399b3('bum): rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang su'ang rung ste/ gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba des mthar gyis bla na med
399b4('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
399b5('bum): b com pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig byung ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs nas phung po ma lus pa'i mya
399b6('bum): ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /ma byon pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
399b7('bum): d ang bcas pa ji snyed cig 'byung ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslab cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
400a1('bum): 'gyur ro/ /de ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji
400a2('bum): s nyad cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslab ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs
400a3('bum): rgyas so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i nang du nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos
400a4('bum): sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang rung ste/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad 'dus so/ /brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
400a5('bum): 'di ni/ rig sngags chen mo'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ bla na med pa'i rig sngags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab
400a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rig sngags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ mi dge ba'i chos
400a7('bum): thams cad spong pa'o/ /dge ba'i chos thams cad sgrub pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ kau shi ka/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha
400b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i 'di ni/ rig sngags chen mo'o/ kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ bla na med pa'i rig sngags so/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
400b2('bum): phyin pa 'di ni/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rig sngags so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
400b3('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig byung ba de dag kyang rig sngags 'di nyid la brten te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /ma byon pa'i dus
400b4('bum): k yi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang rig sngags 'di nyid la brten te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
400b5('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bzhugs shing
400b6('bum): 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang rig sngags 'di nyid la brten te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di
400b7('bum): ltar rig sngags 'di yod na/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ bsam gtan bzhi 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ tshad med pa bzhi 'jig rten na yod pa yin/
401a1('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ mngon par shes pa lnga 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten
401a2('bum): na yod pa yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig
401a3('bum): rten na yod pa yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten na
401a4('bum): yod pa yin/ phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ chen po stong pa nyid
401a5('bum): 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/
401a6('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten yod pa yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa
401a7('bum): yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ mi
401b1('bum): dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
401b2('bum): 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa
401b3('bum): yin/ dbang po rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ stobs rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
401b4('bum): pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa

401b6('bum): pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ mi 'jigs
401b7('bum): pa rnams 'jig rten na yod ba yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ byams pa chen po 'jig rten na yod ba yin/ snying rje chen po 'jig rten na yod pa yin/
402a1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ chos kyi dbyings 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ yang dag pa'i mtha' 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ de
402a2('bum): bzhin nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ chos nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/
402a3('bum): chos kyi gnas nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ chos skyon med pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ mig lnga 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'jig rten na yod
402a4('bum): pa yin/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ dgra bcom pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rang
402a5('bum): byang chub 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ thams cad shes pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'jig rten ma yod pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
402a6('bum): 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po brgya nyer bzhi pa/ /kau shi ka/ byang chub sems dpa' yod na/ dge ba
402a7('bum): bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ bsam gtan bzhi 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ tshad med pa bzhi 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa
402b1('bum): yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ mngon par shes pa lnga 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten
402b2('bum): na gdags su yod pa yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ brtson 'grus kyi
402b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na gdags
402b4('bum): su yod pa yin/ nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/
402b5('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/
402b6('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ mtha' las 'das ba stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags
402b7('bum): su yod pa yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig
403a1('bum): rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa
403a2('bum): yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags
403a3('bum): su yod pa yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ yang dag par
403a4('bum): spong ba rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ dbang po rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ stobs
403a5('bum): rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten na gdags su
403a6('bum): yod pa yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
403a7('bum): par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ mngon
403b1('bum): par shes pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ de bzhin
403b2('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ mi 'jigs pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags
403b3('bum): su yod pa yin/ snying rje chen po 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ thams cad shes pa nyid 'jig
403b4('bum): rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rgyun du zhugs
403b5('bum): pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ phyir mi 'ong ba 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ dgra bcom pa 'jig rten na
403b6('bum): gdags su yod pa yin/ rang sangs rgyas 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten na gdags su yod
403b7('bum): pa yin no/ /kau shi ka/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yod na/ rtsis dang / rgyu skar dang / skar ma thams cad gdags su yod do/ /kau shi ka/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i
404a1('bum): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yod na/ dge ba'i spyod pa dang / yang dag pa'i spyod pa dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i
404a2('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / 'phags
404a3('bum): pa'i bden pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so
404a4('bum): yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i rtsi thams cad gdags su yod do/ /slob pa dang / mi slob pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi rgyu skar dang / skar
404a5('bum): ma thams cad kyang gdags su yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang 'jig rten na yod par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe sangs rgyas
404a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du ma byung ba de'i tshe na'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can rnams la 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa
404a7('bum): chos ston to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / theg pa chen po rnams te/ byang chub sems dpa'
404b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa gang dang ldan pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
404b2('bum): dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /
404b3('bum): phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus
404b4('bum): byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dor
404b5('bum): ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mi dmigs pa
404b6('bum): stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dran pa nye bar
404b7('bum): gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa dang / dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang / stobs rnams la spyod pa dang /
405a1('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan rnams
405a2('bum): la spyod pa dang / tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
405a3('bum): par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa dang / ting nge
405a4('bum): 'dzin rnams la spyod pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod pa dang / so so yang
405a5('bum): dag par rig pa rnams la spyod pa dang / byams pa chen po la spyod pa dang / snying rje chen po la spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spyod pa dang / nyan thos kyi sar
405a6('bum): mi ltung ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis mngon du mi byed pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dang / tshe phun sum tshogs pa
405a7('bum): yongs su 'dzin pa dang / sems can phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' phun sum
405b1('bum): tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob par byed pa'i thabs mkhas pa de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las byung bar rig par bya'o/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan
405b2('bum): yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de ni/ tshe 'di'i
405b3('bum): yon tan 'di dag dang / tshe rabs gzhan gyi yon tan 'di dag dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi
405b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de tshe 'di'i yon tan gang dang ldan par 'gyur pa lags/ bcom
405b5('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa
405b6('bum): dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de/ sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ma gtogs par dug gis dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /mtshon gyis dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /mes dus byed par
405b7('bum): mi 'gyur ro/ /chus dus byed par mi 'gyur ba nas nad brgya rtsa gcig gi bar gyis dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po dang blon pos gnod par bya ba zhig byung ba las/ gal te rigs kyi bu'am
406a1('bum): rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha ton du byed cing rgyal po'i pho brang du song na/ de la glags 'tshol ba de dag gis glags mi rnyed de/ rgyal po'i bu dang /
406a2('bum): rgyal po'i blon po chen po dag kyang gtam dri ba dang / gtam bya bar sems shing dga' bar bya bar sems par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
406a3('bum): phyin pa 'di nyid kyi gzi brjid dang / mthus de ltar sems so/ / gal te rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha ton byed cing rgyal po'i pho brang du
406a4('bum): song na/ de la rgyal po'i bu'am/ rgyal po'i blon po chen po dag kyang dga' ba'i tshig gis gtam dri ba dang / gtam bya bar sems shing / dga' bar bya bar sems par 'gyur
406a5('bum): ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems nye bar bzhag /snying rje'i sems
406a6('bum): dang / dga' ba'i sems dang / btang snyoms kyi sems nye bar bzhag pa'i phyir te/ kau shi ka/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin
406a7('bum): pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa ni/ tshe 'di'i yon tan de dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka/ tshe rabs gzhan
406b1('bum): gyi yon tan gang dag dang ldan par 'gyur zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nam yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang bral bar yang mi 'gyur te/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs
406b2('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang /
406b3('bum): stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms
406b4('bum): par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa
406b5('bum): med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so
406b6('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i smon lam gyi dbang ma gtogs par
406b7('bum): nam yang sems can dmyal bar mi skye/ byol song gi skye gnas su mi skye/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mi skye'o/ /de nam yang yan lag nyams pa can du mi 'gyur/ nam yang dbul po'i rigs
407a1('bum): su mi skye/ smyig ma mkhan gyi rigs sam/ sme sha can gyi rigs sam/ mgar ba'am/ phyag dar ba'am/ shen pa'am/ phag gsod pa'i rigs sam/
407a2('bum): dmangs rigs su mi skye ste/ rtag tu rgyun mi chad par mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par 'gyur/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
407a3('bum): bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu brdzus shing skye bar 'gyur te/ nam yang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ de 'dod na/
407a4('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / chos nyan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ de
407a5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do/ /kau shi ka/ de bas na/
407a6('bum): rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo yon tan 'di dag phun sum tshogs par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya/ kun chub par
407a7('bum): bya/ tshul bzhin du yid la bya/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar bya ste/ de dag ni/ nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
407b1('bum): par sangs rgyas kyi bar du tshe 'di'i yon tan dang / tshe rabs gzhan gyi yon tan de dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u bcu dgu pa'o// //de nas mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu ba glags pa lta ba'i bsam pa can brgya tsam zhig bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su dong ba dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du
407b2('bum): sems par gyur te/ mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu ba brgya po glags pa lta ba'i bsam pa can 'di dag bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong na/ de la bdag gis ci nas kyang shes rab
407b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brjod pas mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu ba 'di dag bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du dong nas bar chad byed par mi 'gyur bar bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las
407b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di snyed cig gzung ba de dag kha ton du bya'o/ snyam nas de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji snyed
407b5('bum): cig bzung ba de dag kha ton du brjod do/ /de nas mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu ba de dag rgyang ring po ring po nas bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas lam de
407b6('bum): nyid dang / sgo de nyid nas phyir dong ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di snyam du gyur te/ de ltar mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu ba de dag gis rgyang ring po ring po nas bcom
408a1('bum): ldan 'das la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ lam de nyid dang / sgo de nyid nas phyir dong na/ de ci'i rgyu zhig snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang
408a2('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu'i sems kyi kun tu rtog pa thugs su chud nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ni/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis shes rab kyi
408a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par bsams pas/ de'i phyir mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu ba 'di dag rgyang ring po ring po nas nga la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te lam de nyid dang /
408a4('bum): sgo de nyid nas phyir dong ba yin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu ba 'di dag las 'ga' tsam la'ang dkar po'i sems dang ldan pa ma mthong ste/ mu stegs
408a5('bum): can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu ba 'di dag thams cad ni/ gnod par bya ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ glags lta ba'i bsam pa can sha stag ste/ 'khor 'dir 'ong bar sems pa sha stag
408a6('bum): kyang shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ngas ni/ 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs par bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye rgu'i nang na gang shes rab kyi pha rol
408a7('bum): tu phyin pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe zhe sdang ba'i sems sam/ glags lta ba'i bsam pas nye bar 'gro ba ma mthong ste/ de ni/ gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ni/
408b1('bum): 'di ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan
408b2('bum): 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang
408b3('bum): ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu
408b4('bum): mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha gang ji snyed cig yod pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig yod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed
408b5('bum): cig yod pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar/ de dag thams cad ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag
408b6('bum): go / shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs
408b7('bum): pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang /
409a1('bum): lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar/ de dag thams cad ni/
409a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go /lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang
409a3('bum): bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam
409a4('bum): mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
409a5('bum): de dag thams cad ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go /nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan

411a1('bum): steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig

411a4('bum): phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar/ de dag thams cad ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go /de nas bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems par gyur to/ /
411a5('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'khor bzhi po 'di dag kyang mngon du gyur/ 'dod pa la spyod pa dang / gzugs la spyod
411a6('bum): pa'i lha 'di dag kyang mngon du gyur ba las/ 'dir ni/ gdon mi za bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
411a7('bum): chub tu lung ston par 'gyur gyis/ de la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste bar chad bya'o/ /snyam nas bdud sdig to can gyis dpung gi tshogs yan/
411b1('bum): lag bzhi pa mngon par sprul nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'gro 'dod par gyur pa dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems par gyur to/ /kye ma bdud
411b2('bum): sdig to can 'di dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa mngon par sprul cing bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'gro bar 'dod la/ bdud sdig to can gyi dpung gi tshogs yan
411b3('bum): lag bzhi pa rnam par bkod pa 'di ni/ rgyal po bim bi sa ri'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa rnam par bkod pas kyang de tsam mi phod/ rgyal po sde rab tu pham byed
411b4('bum): dang / shA kya rnams dang / li tsa byi rnams kyi dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa rnam par bkod pas kyang de tsam mi phod de/ bdud sdig to can 'di ni/ yun ring po nas
411b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das la'ang glags lta zhing glags tshol ba/ sems can yang dag par brtson pa rnams la'ang gtso ba'i bsam pa can yin gyi/ bdag gis shes rab
411b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang dag par bsam par bya'o/ /dran pas brjod par bya'o/ snyam nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang dag par
411b7('bum): bsam ste dran pas gsal bar brjod pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis ji lta ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gsal bar brjod pa de lta de ltar bdud sdig
412a1('bum): can de dag lam de nyid dang / sgo de nyid nas phyir log go /de nas 'khor de na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang / 'og min gyi lha'i bar du ji
412a2('bum): snyed cig 'khod pa de dag gis lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / na bza' mang po mngon par sprul nas bar snang gi nam mkha' la 'khod bzhin du bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der
412a3('bum): gtor te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der mngon par gtor nas tshig 'di skad du brjod do/ /dzam+bu'i gling gi mi 'di rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la yun ring
412a4('bum): por spyod par gyur cig / dzam+bu'i gling gi mi 'di dag ji srid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par

412a7('bum): bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang nub par mi 'gyur la/ dam pa'i chos kyang
412b1('bum): yun ring du gnas shing / dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhe'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod pa khyad par du 'phags pa'ang

414a1('bum): dag ni/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
414a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di las rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid btsal bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las shes rab kyi pha rol

415a1('bum): ma mdzad/ de ltar chen po stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de

415a3('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar dor ba med pa stong pa nyid
415a4('bum): kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su

415a6('bum): de ltar dngos po med pa'i stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar dngos po med pa'i
415a7('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yongs su brjod pa mdzad pa de ltar dran
415b1('bum): pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa

415b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yongs su brjod pa mdzad pa de ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar bsam gtan rnams kyi

415b6('bum): yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad do/ /ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yongs su brjod pa mdzad pa de ltar rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de
415b7('bum): ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa
416a1('bum): med pa'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi
416a2('bum): ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad do/ /ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yongs su brjod pa mdzad
416a3('bum): pa de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar so so yang
416a4('bum): dag par rig pa bzhi'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar snying rje chen po'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
416a5('bum): brgyad kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga
416a6('bum): dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang /
416a7('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
416b1('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi
416b2('bum): 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag gi thog mar 'gro ba'o/ /kun tu 'dren pa'o/ /kun dga' bo/ de ji snyam du sems/
416b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su ma bsngos pa'i sbyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
416b4('bum): stsal pa/ de ji snyam du sems/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su ma bsngos pa'i tshul khrims tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma
416b5('bum): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ji snyam du sems/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su ma bsngos pa'i bzod pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam/
416b6('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ji snyam du sems/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su ma bsngos pa'i brtson 'grus
416b7('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ji snyam du sems/ rnam pa thams
417a1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su ma bsngos pa'i bsam gtan bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma
417a2('bum): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ji snyam du sems/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su ma bsngos pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
417a3('bum): yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ji ltar yongs su bsngos pa'i sbyin pa sbyin pa'i pha
417a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ji ltar yongs su bsngos pa'i tshul khrims tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
417a5('bum): nyid du ji ltar yongs su bsngos pa'i bzod pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ji ltar yongs su bsngos pa'i brtson 'grus brtson 'grus kyi
417a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ji ltar yongs su bsngos pa'i bsam gtan bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
417a7('bum): nyid du ji ltar yongs su bsngos pa'i shes rab shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa
417b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i sbyin pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/ /mi skye ba'i tshul dang / mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
417b2('bum): yongs su bsngos pa'i sbyin pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/ /gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i tshul khrims ni/ tshul
417b3('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/ /mi skye ba'i tshul dang / mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i tshul khrims ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha
417b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa yin no/ /gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i bzod pa ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/ /mi skye ba'i tshul dang /
417b5('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i bzod pa ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/ /gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad
417b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i brtson 'grus ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/ /mi skye ba'i tshul dang / mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
417b7('bum): du yongs su bsngos pa'i brtson 'grus ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/ /gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i bsam
418a1('bum): gtan ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/ /mi skye ba'i tshul dang / mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos
418a2('bum): pa'i bsam gtan ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/ /gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i shes rab ni/ shes
418a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/ /mi skye ba'i tshul dang / mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i shes rab ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol
418a4('bum): tu phyin pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar mi skye ba'i tshul dang / mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad
418a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i sbyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ ji ltar gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar mi skye ba'i tshul dang / mi dmigs pa'i tshul
418a6('bum): gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i tshul khrims tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ ji ltar gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar mi skye ba'i
418a7('bum): tshul dang / mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i bzod pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ ji ltar gnyi su ma mchis
418b1('bum): pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar mi skye ba'i tshul dang / mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i brtson 'grus brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
418b2('bum): lags/ ji ltar gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar mi skye ba'i tshul dang / mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i bsam
418b3('bum): gtan bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ ji ltar gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar mi skye pa'i tshul dang / mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
418b4('bum): du yongs su bsngos pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba gnyis su med
418b5('bum): pa'i tshul dang / 'du shes gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / mig gnyis su med pa'i tshul
418b6('bum): dang | rna ba gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / sna gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / lce gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / lus gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / yid gnyis su med pa'i tshul
418b7('bum): dang | gzugs gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / sgra gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / dri gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / ro gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / reg gnyis su med pa'i
419a1('bum): tshul dang / chos gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul
419a2('bum): dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi
419a3('bum): rnam par shes pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa
419a4('bum): gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gnyis su
419a5('bum): med pa'i tshul dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / sna'i
419a6('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
419a7('bum): ba gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / sa'i khams gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / chu'i khams gnyis su
419b1('bum): med pa'i tshul dang / me'i khams gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / rlung gi khams gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / nam mkha'i khams gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa'i
419b2('bum): khams gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / ma rig pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / ming dang gzugs
419b3('bum): gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / skye mched drug gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / reg pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / sred pa gnyis su med pa'i
419b4('bum): tshul dang / len pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / srid pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / skye ba gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / rga shi gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
419b5('bum): phyin pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha
419b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / nang
419b7('bum): stong pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / phyi stong pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gnyis su med
420a1('bum): pa'i tshul dang / chen po stong pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid gnyis
420a2('bum): su med pa'i tshul dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
420a3('bum): gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid gnyis su
420a4('bum): med pa'i tshul dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid gnyis su
420a5('bum): med pa'i tshul dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams gnyis
420a6('bum): su med pa'i tshul dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / dbang po rnams gnyis su med pa'i
420a7('bum): tshul dang / stobs rnams gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gnyis su med pa'i
420b1('bum): tshul dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / bsam gtan rnams gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / tshad med pa rnams gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / gzugs
420b2('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa rnams gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
420b3('bum): gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / mngon par shes pa rnams gnyis su med pa'i
420b4('bum): tshul dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / mi
420b5('bum): 'jigs pa bzhi gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / snying rje chen po gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
420b6('bum): 'dres pa bco brgyad gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / phyir mi
420b7('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / dgra bcom pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / rang byang chub gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
421a1('bum): byang chub gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar gzugs gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar tshor ba gnyis
421a2('bum): su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar 'du shes gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar 'du byed gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma

421a4('bum): ltar lce gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lus gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar yid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar gzugs gnyis su
