421a6('bum): ltar reg gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar chos gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar mig gi rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar
421a7('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sna'i rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lce'i rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma
421b1('bum): mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lus kyi rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar yid kyi rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar mig gi 'dus te
421b2('bum): reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar
421b3('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul
421b4('bum): dang / ji ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar
421b5('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lus kyi
421b6('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sa'i khams gnyis
421b7('bum): su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar chu'i khams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar me'i khams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rlung gi khams gnyis su ma
422a1('bum): mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar nam mkha'i khams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rnam par shes pa'i khams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i
422a2('bum): tshul dang / ji ltar ma rig pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar 'du byed gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i

422a6('bum): tu phyin pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su ma
422a7('bum): mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul
422b1('bum): dang / ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar nang stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar phyi stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i
422b2('bum): tshul dang / ji ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar stong pa nyid stong ba nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar chen po stong pa nyid gnyis su ma
422b3('bum): mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar 'dus ma byas
422b4('bum): stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid gnyis su ma
422b5('bum): mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar dor ba med pa stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar chos thams cad
422b6('bum): stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul
422b7('bum): dang / ji ltar dngos po med pa stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
423a1('bum): pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar yang dag par spong ba
423a2('bum): rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar dbang po rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /
423a3('bum): ji ltar stobs rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
423a4('bum): pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar mngon par shes pa rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /
423a5('bum): ji ltar tshad med pa rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rnam par
423a6('bum): thar pa brgyad gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo
423a7('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar mngon par shes pa rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar ting
423b1('bum): nge 'dzin rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gnyis su ma mchis
423b2('bum): pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar mi 'jigs pa bzhi gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar snying rje chen po
423b3('bum): gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gnyis su ma mchis
423b4('bum): pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar dgra bcom
423b5('bum): pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rang byang chub gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rnam
423b6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis lags// //shes
423b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po brgya nyer lnga pa/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo/ 'di ltar gzugs ni/ gzugs kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/
424a1('bum): 'di ltar gzugs dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshor ba ni/ tshor bas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar
424a2('bum): tshor ba dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /'du shes ni/ 'du shes kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar 'du shes dang pha rol tu phyin

424a4('bum): su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /rnam par shes pa ni/ rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar rnam par shes pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis
424a5('bum): su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /mig ni/ mig gis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar mig dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /

430a4('bum): tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar rdzu
430a5('bum): 'phrul gyis rkang pa rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /dbang po rnams ni/ dbang po rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/
430a6('bum): 'di ltar dbang po rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /stobs rnams ni/ stobs rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/
430a7('bum): 'di ltar stobs rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i
430b1('bum): phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /lam ni/ lam gyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/
430b2('bum): 'di ltar lam dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de
430b3('bum): ni/ 'di ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /bsam gtan rnams ni/ bsam gtan rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i
430b4('bum): phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar bsam gtan rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshad med pa rnams ni/ tshad med pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i
430b5('bum): phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar tshad med pa rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni/ gzugs med
430b6('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis
430b7('bum): su byar med do/ /rnam par thar pa rnams ni/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar rnam par thar pa rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su
431a1('bum): med de gnyis su byar med do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i
431a2('bum): phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
431a3('bum): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar
431a4('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams ni/ mngon
431a5('bum): par shes pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /ting nge 'dzin
431a6('bum): rnams ni/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /gzungs
431a7('bum): kyi sgo rnams ni/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /
431b1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang pha rol tu
431b2('bum): phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams ni/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar mi 'jigs pa rnams dang pha rol
431b3('bum): tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar so so yang
431b4('bum): dag par rig pa rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /byams pa chen po ni/ byams pa chen pos stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar byams
431b5('bum): pa chen po dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /snying rje chen po ni/ snying rje chen pos stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar snying rje chen po dang pha rol tu
431b6('bum): phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar
431b7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong ste/ de ci'i
432a1('bum): @#/ phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
432a2('bum): bu ni/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis
432a3('bum): su byar med do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag
432a4('bum): gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid ni/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar dgra bcom pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
432a5('bum): dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /rang byang chub ni/ rang byang chub kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar rang byang chub dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis
432a6('bum): su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
432a7('bum): dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis
432b1('bum): stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /dga' bo/ de lta bas
432b2('bum): na/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag gi thog mar 'gro ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do/ stong pa nyid thams cad kyi thog mar 'gro ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do/ /
432b3('bum): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi thog mar 'gro ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i thog mar 'gro ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
432b4('bum): pa nyid do/ /bsam gtan bzhi'i thog mar 'gro ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do/ /tshad med pa bzhi'i thog mar 'gro ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do/ /gzugs
432b5('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i thog mar 'gro ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi thog mar 'gro ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do/ /
432b6('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i thog mar 'gro ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa
432b7('bum): med pa'i thog mar 'gro ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyi thog mar 'gro ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do/ /ting nge 'dzin thams
433a1('bum): cad kyi thog mar 'gro ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do/ /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad kyi thog mar 'gro ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
433a2('bum): nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i thog mar 'gro ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i thog mar 'gro ba ni/ shes rab kyi
433a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i thog mar 'gro ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do/ /snying rje chen po'i thog mar 'gro ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol
433a4('bum): tu phyin pa nyid do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres ba bco brgyad kyi thog mar 'gro ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do/ /thams cad shes pa nyid kyi thog mar 'gro ba ni/ shes rab kyi
433a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi thog mar 'gro ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi thog mar 'gro ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha
433a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa nyid do/ /dga' bo/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sa chen po la sa bon btab pa rgyu rkyen tshogs par gyur nas rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba yang / sa chen po ni/ de dag gi gnas
433a7('bum): te/ sa chen po la brten cing sa bon de dag skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten cing pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag rnam par 'phel lo/ /nang stong pa nyid rnam
433b1('bum): par 'phel lo/ /phyi stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo/ /chen po stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo/ /don dam
433b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo/ /thog ma dang
433b3('bum): tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo/ /rang gi
433b4('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo/ /dngos po
433b5('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rnam par 'phel lo/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams rnam par 'phel lo/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams rnam par
433b6('bum): 'phel lo/ /dbang po rnams rnam par 'phel lo/ /stobs rnams rnam par 'phel lo/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams rnam par 'phel lo/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnam par
433b7('bum): 'phel lo/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams rnam par 'phel lo/ /bsam gtan rnams rnam par 'phel lo/ /tshad med pa rnams rnam par 'phel lo/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
434a1('bum): rnams rnam par 'phel lo/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad rnam par 'phel lo/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rnam par 'phel lo/ /rnam par thar
434a2('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par 'phel lo/ /mngon par shes pa rnams rnam par 'phel lo/ / ting nge 'dzin rnams rnam par 'phel lo/ /gzungs
434a3('bum): kyi sgo rnams rnam par 'phel lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnam par 'phel lo/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi rnam par 'phel lo/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rnam par 'phel
434a4('bum): lo/ /snying rje chen po rnam par 'phel lo/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnam par 'phel lo/ /thams cad shes pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
434a5('bum): rnam par 'phel lo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par 'phel te/ dga' bo/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing pha rol tu phyin pa lnga rnams rnam par 'phel lo/ /
434a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing stong pa nyid thams cad rnam par 'phel lo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi rnam par 'phel
434a7('bum): lo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing yang dag par spong ba bzhi rnam par 'phel lo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi rnam par
434b1('bum): 'phel lo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing dbang po lnga rnam par 'phel lo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing stobs lnga rnam par 'phel lo/ /rnam pa
434b2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing byang chub kyi yan lag bdun rnam par 'phel lo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnam
434b3('bum): par 'phel lo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rnam par 'phel lo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing bsam gtan
434b4('bum): bzhi rnam par 'phel lo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing tshad med pa bzhi rnam par 'phel lo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing gzugs med pa'i
434b5('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi rnam par 'phel lo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing rnam par thar pa brgyad rnam par 'phel lo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la
434b6('bum): brten cing mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnam par 'phel lo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
434b7('bum): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par 'phel lo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing mngon par shes pa rnams rnam par 'phel lo/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
435a1('bum): nyid la brten cing ting nge 'dzin rnams rnam par 'phel lo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing gzungs kyi sgo rnams rnam par 'phel lo/ /
435a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnam par 'phel lo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing mi 'jigs pa bzhi rnam
435a3('bum): par 'phel lo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rnam par 'phel lo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing snying rje chen
435a4('bum): po rnam par 'phel lo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnam par 'phel lo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten
435a5('bum): cing thams cad shes pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
435a6('bum): nyid la brten cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo/ /dga' bo/ de lta bas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag yongs
435a7('bum): su sgrub pa'o/ /stong pa nyid thams cad yongs su sgrub pa'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su sgrub pa'o/ /yang dag bar spong ba bzhi yongs su sgrub pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi
435b1('bum): yongs su sgrub pa'o/ /dbang po lnga yongs su sgrub pa'o/ /stobs lnga yongs su sgrub pa'o/ /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su sgrub pa'o/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su sgrub
435b2('bum): pa'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su sgrub pa'o/ /bsam gtan bzhi yongs su sgrub pa'o/ /tshad med pa bzhi yongs su sgrub pa'o/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs
435b3('bum): su sgrub pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su sgrub pa'o/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su sgrub pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa
435b4('bum): dang / smon pa med pa yongs su sgrub pa'o/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su sgrub pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su sgrub pa'o/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su sgrub pa'o/ /de bzhin
435b5('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su sgrub pa'o/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su sgrub pa'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su sgrub pa'o/ /snying rje chen po yongs su sgrub pa'o/ /sangs rgyas
435b6('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su sgrub pa'o/ /thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su sgrub pa'o/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su sgrub pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su
435b7('bum): sgrub pa'o/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
436a1('bum): kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan gang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las thos te/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha
436a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / yongs su chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i yon tan gang ji snyed cig mchis pa dang / shes
436a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i yon tan gang ji snyed cig bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las bzung ste/ bcangs pa dang / bklags pa dang / kun chub par bgyis pa dang / spel ba de dag
436a4('bum): thams cad bka' stsal to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / bklags pa dang / spel ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis
436a5('bum): pas ni/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /tshad med pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur
436a6('bum): ro/ / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes pa lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig
436a7('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /brtson 'grus kyi
436b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /nang
436b2('bum): stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung
436b3('bum): bar 'gyur ro/ /chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /
436b4('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar
436b5('bum): 'gyur ro/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur
436b6('bum): ro/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur
436b7('bum): ro/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar
437a1('bum): 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dbang po lnga 'jig rten
437a2('bum): du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig
437a3('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i
437a4('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /
437a5('bum): mngon par shes pa lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur
437a6('bum): ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'jig
437a7('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /snying rje chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/
437b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / bklags pa dang / kun chub par bgyis pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis pas/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams
437b2('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /
437b3('bum): rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams
437b4('bum): 'jig rten na mchis so/ /'phrul dga' lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams 'jig rten na
437b5('bum): mchis so/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /snang
437b6('bum): ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /chung snang gi lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten
437b7('bum): na mchis so/ /dge ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /chung dge'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams
438a1('bum): 'jig rten na mchis so/ /che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /chung che'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /tshad med che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis
438a2('bum): so/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /mi che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /mi gdung ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha
438a3('bum): rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /'og min gyi lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
438a4('bum): phyin pa bzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / bklags pa dang / kun chub par bgyis pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis bas ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /
438a5('bum): lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /dgra bcom pa rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams 'jig
438a6('bum): rten na mchis so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang /
438a7('bum): bklags pa dang / kun chub par bgyis pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis pas ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang 'jig
438b1('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung ba dang / bcangs
438b2('bum): pa dang / bklags pa dang / kun chub par byas pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byas pa de'i yon tan ni/ der zad par yang ma bshad de/ kau shi ka /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu'am
438b3('bum): rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byad pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
438b4('bum): pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar byed pa de dag ni/ tshul khrims kyi phung po tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
438b5('bum): 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar byed pa de dag
438b6('bum): ni ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun
438b7('bum): chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar byed pa de dag ni/ shes rab kyi phung po tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur
439a1('bum): ro/ /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul
439a2('bum): bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar byed pa de dag ni/ rnam par grol ba'i phung po tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /rigs
439a3('bum): kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / rnam
439a4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar byed pa de dag ni/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka /rigs kyi bu'am
439a5('bum): rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
439a6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar byed pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i don du zhugs par rig par bya'o/ /kau shi ka /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul
439a7('bum): khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dang / gang yang rigs
439b1('bum): kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i
439b2('bum): phung po las/ kau shi ka /tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung
439b3('bum): po 'di la ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam
439b4('bum): par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung pos brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba'i char yang nye bar mi
439b5('bum): 'gro'o/ /bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi
439b6('bum): 'gro'o/ /grangs su'ang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bgrang bar yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /dper yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /rgyur yang mi bzod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar
439b7('bum): rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis las/ sems rnam par grol yang chos gang yang yongs su shes pa med do/ /kau shi ka /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs
440a1('bum): kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de la me
440a2('bum): tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis de la rim gror byed pa dang / bkur
440a3('bum): stir byed pa dang / phu dud du byed pa dang / mchod par byed pa de dag tshe 'di nyid dang / tshe rabs phyi ma la yon tan de dag rnam pa de bzhin du 'thob par ngas bshad do/ /brgya byin gyis gsol
440a4('bum): ba| bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin
440a5('bum): du yid la bgyid cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar bgyid pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang /
440a6('bum): byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyid pa dang / bkur stir bgyid pa dang / phu dud du
440a7('bum): bgyid pa dang / mchod par bgyid pa de la ni/ bdag gis kyang rtag tu rgyun mi chad par bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau
440b1('bum): shi ka / rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha ton du byed pa'i tshe lha'i bu brgya stong mang po dga' ba'i yid kyis chos nyan pa'i phyir nye bar 'ongs te/ rigs
440b2('bum): kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos ston pa'i tshe'ang lha'i bu de dag spobs pa nye bar bsgrub par sems so/ /chos smra ba de dag smra snyam par gyur
440b3('bum): na'ang lha'i bu de dag chos kyi rim gror de nyid kyis spobs pa nye bar bsgrub par sems te/ kau shi ka /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /
440b4('bum): 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bris shing me tog dang / phreng ba dang / bdug spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang /
440b5('bum): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed pa dang / bkur stir byed pa dang / phu dud du byed pa dang / mchod par byed pa de dag gis tshe 'di'i yon
440b6('bum): tan 'di'ang yongs su zin par 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka /gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag 'khor bzhi la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa'i tshe la la zhig bdag la klan
440b7('bum): ka tshol zhing glags lta bar gyur du 'ong ngo / /zhes bya bar zhum pa med par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
441a1('bum): 'di nyid srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / skyong ba byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la ni/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten
441a2('bum): las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / thun mong dang / thung mong ma yin pa dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / nyan
441a3('bum): thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang tha mi dad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'di ni/ dge ba'i chos
441a4('bum): thams cad kyi gter yin la/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'ang nang stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / stong
441a5('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa
441a6('bum): nyid la gnas pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / rang bzhin
441a7('bum): stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / dngos po
441b1('bum): med pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la glags blta ba de'ang yang dag
441b2('bum): par rjes su mi mthong / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gang glags blta bar byed pa de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gang glags blta bar bya ba de'ang yang
441b3('bum): dag par rje su mi mthong ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba'i phyir rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la sus kyang glags blta ba med do/ /kau shi ka /gzhan
441b4('bum): yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de'i sems zhum par mi
441b5('bum): 'gyur/ yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur/ 'jigs par mi 'gyur/ dngang bar mi 'gyur/ skrag par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de
441b6('bum): dag gis gang zhum par 'gyur ba'am/ yongs su zhum par 'gyur ba'am/ 'jigs par 'gyur ba'am/ dngang bar 'gyur ba'am/ skrag par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po yang dag par rjes
441b7('bum): su ma mthong ba'i phyir te/ kau shi ka /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin
442a1('bum): du yid la byed pa dang / bris shing de la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang /
442a2('bum): sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed pa dang / bkur stir byed pa dang / phu dud du byed pa dang / mchod par byed pa de dag gis tshe 'di'i yon tan 'di dag yongs su zin par 'gyur ro/ /kau shi
442a3('bum): ka / gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid
442a4('bum): la byed pa dang / bris shing de la me tog dang / phreng ba dang spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs
442a5('bum): kyis rim gror byed pa dang / bkur stir byed pa dang / phu dud du byed pa dang / mchod par byed pa de ni/ pha dang / ma dang / gnyen bshes dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / dge sbyong dang /
442a6('bum): bram ze dag gis dgos par bya ba yin/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
442a7('bum): chen po rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / dgra bcom pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / rgyun du zhugs pa gang ji snyed yod pa de dag gis kyang dgos shing
442b1('bum): yid du 'ong bar bya ba yin/ 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye rgu dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas
442b2('bum): pas kyang dgos shing yid du 'ong bar bya ba yin/ spobs pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'phrog
442b3('bum): par 'gyur ba yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'phrog par 'gyur ba yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'phrog par 'gyur ba yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi
442b4('bum): 'phrog par 'gyur ba yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'phrog pa 'gyur ba yin/ nang stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrog par 'gyur ba yin/ phyi stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrog par
442b5('bum): 'gyur ba yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrog par 'gyur ba yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrog par 'gyur ba yin/ chen po stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrog par 'gyur ba yin/
442b6('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrog par 'gyur ba yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrog par 'gyur ba yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrog par 'gyur ba
442b7('bum): yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrog par 'gyur ba yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrog par 'gyur ba yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid sgom pa
443a1('bum): mi 'phrog par 'gyur ba yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrog par 'gyur ba yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrog par 'gyur ba
443a2('bum): yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrog par 'gyur ba yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrog par 'gyur ba yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid
443a3('bum): sgom pa mi 'phrog par 'gyur ba yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrog par 'gyur ba yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrog par 'gyur ba
443a4('bum): yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa mi 'phrog par 'gyur ba yin/ yang dag par spong ba sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur
443a5('bum): ba yin/ dbang po lnga sgom pa mi 'phrog par 'gyur ba yin/ stobs lnga sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/
443a6('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom pa mi 'phrog par 'gyur ba yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi sgom pa mi 'phrog par 'gyur ba yin/ bsam gtan bzhi sgom pa mi 'phrog
443a7('bum): par 'gyur ba yin/ tshad med pa bzhi sgom pa mi 'phrog par 'gyur ba yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi sgom pa mi 'phrog par 'gyur ba yin/ rnam par thar pa
443b1('bum): brgyad sgom pa mi 'phrog par 'gyur ba yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sgom pa mi 'phrog par 'gyur ba yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa
443b2('bum): dang / smon pa med pa sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ mngon par shes pa sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ ting nge 'dzin sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ gzungs kyi sgo
443b3('bum): sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi sgom pa mi 'phrog par 'gyur ba yin/ so so yang dag
443b4('bum): par rig pa bzhi sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ snying rje chen po sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sgom pa mi 'phrog par 'gyur ba yin/
443b5('bum): sems can yongs su smin par bya ba sgom pa mi 'phrog par 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba sgom pa mi 'phrog par 'gyur ba yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
443b6('bum): pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ gzhan gyis phyir rgol ba ji snyed byung ba la'ang chos dang mthun par lan gdab pa'i mthu yod pa yin te/ kau shi ka /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi
443b7('bum): bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub bar byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems
444a1('bum): dang yang ma bral bar byed pa dang / bris shing de la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan
444a2('bum): dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed pa dang / bkur stir byed pa dang / phu dud du byed pa dang / mchod pa byed pa des tshe 'di'i yon tan 'di dag kyang yongs su zin
444a3('bum): par 'gyur ro/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po brgya nyer drug pa/ /kau shi ka /gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol
444a4('bum): t u phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du byas te 'chang ba der stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
444a5('bum): chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris kyi lha dang / tshangs lha nye
444a6('bum): phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba
444a7('bum): dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag kyang der
444b1('bum): dong zhing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bklag pa dang / gzung ba dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / 'dud pa byas shing phyir 'dong bar sems so/ /gnas gtsang ma'i
444b2('bum): ris mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha de dag kyang der dong zhing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bklag pa dang / gzung ba
444b3('bum): dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / 'dud pa byas shing phyir 'dong bar sems so/ /kau shi ka /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu bla na
444b4('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /
444b5('bum): tshangs ris kyi lha dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang /
444b6('bum): chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha'i bu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par
444b7('bum): zhugs pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha dang / de ma yin pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin
445a1('bum): dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gzi brjid che bar bya ba mang po dag kyang der dong zhing shes rab
445a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bklag pa dang / gzung ba dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / 'dud pa byas shing phyir 'dong bar sems so/ /kau shi ka /de la rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs
445a3('bum): kyi bu mo de dag gis kyang sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga'
445a4('bum): ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung

445a6('bum): bu che ba'i lha bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang
445a7('bum): ba dang / 'og min gyi lha dang / de ma yin pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gzi brjid
445b1('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bklag pa dang / gzung ba dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lhags pa de dag la chos kyi sbyin pa 'di byin par
445b2('bum): gyur cig ces sems bskyed par byas te/ de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bklag pa dang / gzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / mchod pa byas shing phyag byas
445b3('bum): te/ 'dud pa byas nas phyir 'dong ngo / /kau shi ka /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum

445b6('bum): che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha'i bu dag dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi

446a4('bum): dang / skyob pa dang / skyong ba byed de/ kau shi ka /de la las kyi rnam par smin pa ma gtogs par glags lta ba rnams kyis kyang glags mi rnyed de/ kau shi ka /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs
446a5('bum): kyi bu mo des tshe 'di'i yon tan de lta bu dag kyang yongs su zin par 'gyur ro/ /lha'i bu gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag kyang der shes
446a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mchod pa bya ba dang / rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / bskyang bar bya ba'i don du 'dong bar sems te/ de ci'i
446a7('bum): phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa ste/ sems can thams
446b1('bum): cad bskyab pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don du nye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro/ /brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom
446b2('bum): ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des 'dir phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bklag pa dang / gzung ba dang / kun chub bar

447a6('bum): so/ /zhes bgyi bar ji ltar 'tshal bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka /gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gang du bzhag par snang ba chen po
447a7('bum): byung bar rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos mthong na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des 'dir ni/ lha mthu bo che/ mthu chen po/ /rdzu 'phrul che ba/ dbang che ba/ gzi brjid
447b1('bum): che ba dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bklag pa dang / bcang ba dang / kun chub bar bya ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / 'dud par bya ba dang / rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang /

447b6('bum): dag nye bar 'ong bar sems pa de lta de ltar rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'ang mos pa rgya chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de'i gnas kyi 'khor kun tu'ang gtsang sbra med pa'i spyad pa mi rgyu bar
447b7('bum): byas te/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir de'i 'khor gyi sa'ang spos chu'i chag chag gis gdab bo/ /me tog dang / spos kyis
448a1('bum): gtor to/ /bdug spos 'thul ba'i snod bzhag go /dar gyi lda ldi dang / gos kyi bla re bre'o/ /sa'i phyogs rnam pa du mas brgyan par bya'o/ /kau shi ka /rigs kyi

448a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bsam pas mos par byas na/ sdig to'i rmi lam mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /des mthong na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
448a5('bum): sangs rgyas mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mnga' ba/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus kun tu brgyan pa/ sku gser gyi mdog tu bzhugs pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis kun
448a6('bum): nas bskor ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun du bdar ba chos ston pa mthong bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa da las 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
448a7('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
448b1('bum): phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid
448b2('bum): dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos
448b3('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo
448b4('bum): bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub
448b5('bum): kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med
448b6('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa

449a1('bum): dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi chos bstan
449a2('bum): pa'ang thos par 'gyur ro/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur

450a6('bum): stobs bcu po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi po
450a7('bum): de dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro/ /snying rje chen po de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po de dag gi don
450b1('bum): rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi shing yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi shing drung du 'gro ba'ang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /
450b2('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'ang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar mngon par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'ang mthong
450b3('bum): bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong mang po chos yang dag par bgro bar byed cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni 'di ltar yongs su bsgrub par bya'o/ /sems can
450b4('bum): mang po ni/ 'di ltar yongs su smin par bya'o/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni/ 'di ltar yongs su bzung bar bya'o/ /bdud 'khor dang bcas pa ni/ 'di ltar pham par bya'o/ /zhes zer ba

457b1('bum): phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas pas ni/ ma yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u nyi shu gcig pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das
457b2('bum): kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin pa bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka /khyod kyis dzam+bu'i gling de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur gang ba zhig kyang rnyed/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
457b3('bum): phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bris pa zhig kyang la las byin na/ de las gang blang bar bya/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te dzam+bu'i gling de bzhin gshegs
457b4('bum): pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur gtams pa zhig kyang la las stsal/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bris pa zhig kyang la las stsal na/ shes rab kyi pha rol
457b5('bum): tu phyin pa 'di nyid bdag gis blang bar bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag la bdag rim gro ma mchis pa'ang ma lags/
457b6('bum): mi rton pa'ang ma lags/ btsun par mi bgyid pa'ang ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung la rim gror bgyi bar mi 'tshal ba'ang /
457b7('bum): bkur stir bgyi bar mi 'tshal ba'ang / phu dud du bgyi bar mi 'tshal ba'am/ mchod par bgyi bar mi 'tshal ba'ang ma lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs
458a1('bum): pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ste/ de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams kyang rim gror bgyi ba
458a2('bum): lags/ bkur stir bgyi ba lags/ phu dud du bgyi ba lags/ mchod par bgyi ba lags/ sku gdung de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas bsgrubs pa ste/ de'i
458a3('bum): slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mchod pa mnga' ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ nam bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung la lha rdzas kyi me tog
458a4('bum): dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi
458a5('bum): rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyid cing / bkur stir bgyid pa dang / phu dud du bgyid pa dang / mchod par
458a6('bum): bgyid pa'i tshe'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las phyung ba lags pas na/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
458a7('bum): 'jig rten gyis rim gror bgyi ba lags/ bkur stir bgyi ba lags/ phu dud du bgyi ba lags/ mchod par bgyi ba lags pas/ bsrung zhing / rim gro dang / bkur
458b1('bum): sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod par bgyid do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kau shi ka /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
458b2('bum): 'di ni/ gzung du med pa/ gzugs med pa/ bltar med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa yin na/ de la khyod ji ltar na/
458b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung du med pa/ gzugs med pa/ bltar med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa la gzung bar
458b4('bum): sems/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ 'dzin pa dang / dor bar bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin/ 'grib pa'i phyir ma yin/ 'phel ba'i phyir ma yin/ bskyed
458b5('bum): pa'i phyir ma yin/ bskyud pa'i phyir ma yin/ dbri ba'i phyir ma yin/ bsnan pa'i phyir ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyir ma yin/ rnam par byang ba'i phyir ma yin/ sangs rgyas
458b6('bum): kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor ba ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams sbyin par byed pa ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye
458b7('bum): bar sgrub pa ma yin/ nyan thos kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ slob pa dang mi slob pa'i chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor bar byed pa ma
459a1('bum): yin/ 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dus byas kyi khams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa
459a2('bum): ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma
459a3('bum): yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ phyi stong pa
459a4('bum): nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dus
459a5('bum): byas stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med
459a6('bum): pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid nye bar
459a7('bum): sgrub pa ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/
459b1('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ yang dag par
459b2('bum): spong ba rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dbang po rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ stobs rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ byang chub kyi
459b3('bum): yan lag rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ bsam gtan rnams
459b4('bum): nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ tshad med pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rnam par thar ba rnams nye bar sgrub pa
459b5('bum): ma yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nye bar sgrub pa
459b6('bum): ma yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
459b7('bum): stobs rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mi 'jigs pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ snying rje chen po nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas
460a1('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i
460a2('bum): 'bras bu nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dgra bcom pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rang byang chub nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rnam pa thams
460a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin no/ /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gang gis de ltar

462a1('bum): so/ legs so/ /de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes

464a5('bum): zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /kau shi ka /gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
464a6('bum): pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
464a7('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /kau shi ka /gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ bsam gyis
464b1('bum): mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su med
464b2('bum): de gnyis su byar med do/ /kau shi ka /gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi
464b3('bum): ka / de ni/ 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /kau shi ka /gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis
464b4('bum): su 'dod pa de ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings
464b5('bum): de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /kau shi ka /gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i
464b6('bum): phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /kau shi ka /gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
464b7('bum): pa la gnyis su 'dod pa ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gyis mi
465a1('bum): khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po brgya nyer bdun pa/
465a2('bum): de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas
465a3('bum): pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bgyi bar 'os pa ste/ de la bslab pas ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
465a4('bum): rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang gi tshe bdag chos bzang po'i lha'i 'khor du
465a5('bum): bdag nyid kyi lha'i dbang po'i stan la mchis par gyur pa de'i tshe/ der lha'i bu gang ji snyed cig bdag gi rim grol mchis pa de dag kun klung bdag la mchod par bgyid de/ nam
465a6('bum): bdag der ma mchis shing stan de la ma mchis pa de'i tshe'ang lha'i bu de dag 'khor der mchis shing / lha'i dbang po brgya byin stan 'di la 'dug cing sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams
465a7('bum): la chos ston to/ /zhes stan de la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba bgyis shing / phyag btsal te slar mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du gang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
465b1('bum): bris shing 'chang ba dang / kha ton du bgyid cing gzhan la'ang rgya cher ston pa der phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam
465b2('bum): mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ 'di las byung
465b3('bum): ngo / /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang 'di las byung ngo / /sems can thams cad kyi bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang 'di las byung ngo / /zhes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag
465b4('bum): bgyi zhing 'dud pa bgyis nas slar mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams mchod pa mnga' ba'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su
465b5('bum): bsgrubs pa'i slad du mchod pa mnga' ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe shes rab kyi
465b6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi gzhir gyur to/ /rgyur gyur to/ /rkyen du gyur to/ /yongs su bsgrub par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de lta bas na/ cha de gnyis las
465b7('bum): bdag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid len to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang gi tshe bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di blangs te chos kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i yid kyis
466a1('bum): kha ton bgyid pa de'i tshe 'jigs pa'am/ bag tsha ba'i mtshan ma tsam yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das/ de ci'i slad du zhe
466a2('bum): na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni smos su ma mchis

470b5('bum): snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyid/ bkur stir bgyid/ phu dud du bgyid/ mchod par bgyid na/ de ni/ nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
470b6('bum): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du sems can dmyal ba'i rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o/ /byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi rgyud kyi dogs pa ma
470b7('bum): mchis par bgyi'o/ /nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o/ /de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang yang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ sems can
471a1('bum): yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang yang mi 'bral bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la me tog
471a2('bum): dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti
471a3('bum): dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa bgyid cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen
471a4('bum): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur gtams pa zhig kyang stsal la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang bris te stsal na/ bcom
471a5('bum): ldan 'das/ dkon mchog de gnyis las bdag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid len to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni/ de bzhin
471a6('bum): gshegs pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams te/ de bas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rim gror bgyi ba dang / bkur stir bgyi ba dang /
471a7('bum): phu dud du bgyi zhing mchod par bgyi ba lags te/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag gis de dag la rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/ mchod
471b1('bum): par bgyis na log par ltung ba dang / ngan song du mchi bar mi 'gyur te/ lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa myong nas/ smon lam gyi tshul bzhin du nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
471b2('bum): theg pa'am/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de lta bas na/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang /
471b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bris pa mthong ba de ni/ mi 'dra ba ma mchis so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
471b4('bum): pa la gnyis su ma mchis te/ gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis
471b5('bum): cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum la bzhugs te/ mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das
471b6('bum): pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / chos gtan la dbab pa bstan pa gsungs te bshad pa dang / rigs kyi bu'am/
471b7('bum): rigs kyi bu mo la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung zhing kun chub par bgyis te/ gzhan la bstan pa de gnyis kyang mi 'dra ba ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ci'i slad
472a1('bum): du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so/ /'di las byung ba ni/ cho 'phrul rnam
472a2('bum): pa gsum mo/ /'di las byung ba ni/ mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung du bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar

472a4('bum): yang shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / lho phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
472a5('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas dang / nub phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa

472a7('bum): mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
472b1('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / 'og gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs
472b2('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / steng gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mang

473b1('bum): rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o/ /byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o/ /nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i dogs pa

474a1('bum): ni/ gang nas kyang 'jigs pa 'byung ba'i dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu nor gyi bdag po zhig
474a2('bum): 'jigs nas rgyal po la gnas shing / rgyal po la brten na/ de rgyal po la gnas shing / rgyal po la brten pas/ sus 'jigs pa de dag nyid kyang de la brten pas/ de dag gis
474a3('bum): 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ de ltar gnas te/ gang rgyal po la brten pa ni/ mthu dang ldan pa la brten pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de

474b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ste/ de dag pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob bo/ /'di las byung ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ grong ngam/ grong
474b3('bum): rdal lam/ grong khyer ram/ khams sam/ rgyal po'i gnas sam/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog

474b5('bum): rnyed par mi 'gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang theg pa gsum las/ theg pa gang yang rung bas mthar gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan
474b6('bum): 'das/ de lta bas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ don chen po dang ldan pa ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de ltar sems can rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi
474b7('bum): don du nye bar gnas so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mchis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams der ni/ sangs rgyas byung ba dang 'dra bar blta'o/ /
475a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nor bu rin po che chen po mi dpogs rin chen zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ de ni/ nor bu rin po che chen po'i yon tan gyi
475a2('bum): rnam pa 'di lta bu dag dang ldan te/ nor bu rin po che chen po de gang dang gang du bzhag pa de dang der mi ma lags pa rnams kyis glags mi rnyed do/ mi ma lags pas zin pa'i skyes pa'am bud

475a4('bum): chen po de btags na/ mkhris pa de'ang 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /rlung gis mnar ba'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na/ rlung de'ang 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /bad kan gyis non pa'i

478a1('bum): lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni/ tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang chen pa stong pa nyid kyi snod

478a3('bum): gdung de dag kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni/ tshad ma
478a4('bum): mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/
478a5('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni/ tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mtha' las 'das pa

478a7('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan
478b1('bum): ni/ tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par

479a1('bum): par bgyi ste/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni/ tshad ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi snod do/ /bcom

484b1('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /tshad med pa
484b2('bum): bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i
484b3('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes pa rnams
484b4('bum): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su
484b5('bum): rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur
484b6('bum): ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de ched du bsams te lus yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /lus de dag gis sems can yongs su smin par
484b7('bum): bgyid par 'gyur te/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i lus sam/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'am/ bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba'am/ khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho bar skyes bu'i lus sam/
485a1('bum): brgya byin gyi gzugs sam/ tshangs pa'i gzugs sam/ ngal bso po'i gzugs kyang rung ste/ lus de dag gis sems can yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur
485a2('bum): ro/ /nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das te byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas byang chub
485a3('bum): sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa thob nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom
485a4('bum): ldan 'das/ de bas na/ bdag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung la rim gro ma mchis pa'ang ma lags/ glo ba ma ches pa'ang ma mchis/ mchod par mi 'tshal ba'ang ma
485a5('bum): lags/ gzung bar mi 'tshal ba'ang ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyis rim gro dang / bkur
485a6('bum): sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod par bgyis na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rgyu shin tu bsags pa lags/ phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang yongs su zin par 'gyur/ de
485a7('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la'ang / rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod par bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig
485b1('bum): rten gyi khams tshad dang grangs ma mchis pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag
485b2('bum): kyang chos kyi sku dang / gzugs kyi sku dang / ye shes kyi skur mthong bar 'tshal zhing mchod par 'tshal bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid gzung bar bgyi/ bcang bar bgyi/ bklag
485b3('bum): par bgyi/ kun chub par bgyi/ mchod par bgyi/ gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bgyi/ tshul bzhin du yid la bgyi ste/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo des ni/ phyogs bcu'i
