485b4('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams grangs dang tshad ma mchis pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de bas na/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs
485b5('bum): kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa des chos nyid du sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin
485b6('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mthong bar 'tshal bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzung bar bgyi/ bcang bar bgyi/ bklag par bgyi/ kun
485b7('bum): chub par bgyi/ mchod par bgyi/ gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bgyi/ chos nyid tshul bzhin du'ang yid la bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gnyis po 'di dag ni/ chos nyid de/
486a1('bum): gnyis gang zhe na/ 'dus byas chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang / 'dus ma byas chos rnams kyi chos nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de la 'dus byas chos rnams kyi
486a2('bum): chos nyid gang lags she na/ nang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / chen po stong pa
486a3('bum): nyid kyi ye shes dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi
486a4('bum): ye shes dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi
486a5('bum): ye shes dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye
486a6('bum): shes dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi'i ye shes dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
486a7('bum): bzhi'i ye shes dang / dbang po lnga'i ye shes dang / stobs lnga'i ye shes dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi ye shes dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ye shes dang /
486b1('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / bsam gtan bzhi'i ye shes dang / tshad med pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / rnam par thar
486b2('bum): pa brgyad kyi ye shes dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ye shes dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i ye shes dang / mngon
486b3('bum): par shes pa lnga'i ye shes dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ye shes dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad kyi ye shes dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ye shes dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i
486b4('bum): ye shes dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / snying rje chen po'i ye shes dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ye shes dang / dge ba'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang /
486b5('bum): mi dge ba'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / 'jig
486b6('bum): rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes gang lags pa de ni/ 'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid ces bgyi'o/ /de la 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang lags she na/ de ni
486b7('bum): gang la skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / gnas pa ma mchis pa dang / gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang /
487a1('bum): rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa dang / 'phel ba ma mchis pa dang / 'grib ba ma mchis pa ste/ de ni/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid do/ /chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid
487a2('bum): gang lags she na/ chos thams cad ni/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid de/ de ni/ 'dus ma byas chos rnams kyi chos nyid ces bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka
487a3('bum): de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
487a4('bum): pa 'di nyid la brten te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
487a5('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /
487a6('bum): da ltar byung ba'i phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho
487a7('bum): skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /'das
487b1('bum): pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyad cig byung ba dang / ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
487b2('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang
487b3('bum): ji snyed cig yod pa de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/ thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
487b4('bum): thob bo/ thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/ thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob po/ thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /'das pa'i dus kyi rang sangs
487b5('bum): rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na rang sangs rgyas gang
487b6('bum): ji snyed cig 'khod cing 'tsho skyong ba de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te rang byang chub thob bo/ thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab
487b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum po thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag kyang mtshan ma med pa'i tshul dang / dmigs pa med pa'i tshul dang / skye ba med pa'i tshul dang / 'gag pa
488a1('bum): med pa'i tshul dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i tshul dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i tshul dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i tshul dang / len pa med
488a2('bum): pa'i tshul dang / 'dor ba med pa'i tshul dang / dbri ba med pa'i tshul dang / bsnan pa med pa'i tshul dang / blang ba med pa'i tshul dang / spang ba med pa'i tshul gyis bstan te/ de'ang
488a3('bum): 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi tshul gyis bstan gyi/ don dam par ni ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ ring du song ba ma yin/ pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te/
488a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ tshu rol ma yin/ pha rol ma yin/ thang du 'dug pa ma yin/ gshong du 'dug pa ma yin/ mnyam pa ma yin/ mi mnyam pa ma yin/ mtshan ma ma
488a5('bum): yin/ mtshan ma med pa ma yin/ 'jig rten pa ma yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa ma yin// 'dus byas ma yin/ 'dus ma byas ma yin/ dge ba ma yin/ mi dge ba ma yin/
488a6('bum): 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin te/ kau shi ka /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ kau shi ka/ shes rab
488a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ kau shi ka/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/
488b1('bum): kau shi ka /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ kau shi ka/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ kau
488b2('bum): shi ka/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor ba ma yin no// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu
488b3('bum): phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po brgya nyer brgyad pa/ /brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa chen po ste/ bcom ldan 'das/
488b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa rnams ni/ sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / spyod pa'ang 'tshal te/ sems can du dmigs pa
488b5('bum): ma mchis so/ /sems can du gdags par dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /bdag tu dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /sems can du dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /srog tu dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /'gro bar
488b6('bum): dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /gso bar dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /skyes bur dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /gang zag tu dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /shed can du dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /shed bdag
488b7('bum): tu dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /byed pa por dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /tshor ba por dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /shes pa bor dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /mthong ba por dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /
489a1('bum): gzugs su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /'du shes su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /'du byed du dmigs pa ma mchis
489a2('bum): so/ /rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /mig tu dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /rna bar dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /snar dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /lcer dmigs pa ma mchis
489a3('bum): so/ /lus su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /yid du dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /gzugs su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /sgrar dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /drir dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /
489a4('bum): ror dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /reg tu dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /chos su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /mig gi rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes par
489a5('bum): dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /sna'i rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /lce'i rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /lus kyi rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis
489a6('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /sna'i 'dus te
489a7('bum): reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg par dmigs pa ma
489b1('bum): mchis so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa
489b2('bum): las byung ba'i tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmigs pa ma
489b3('bum): mchis so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /sa'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /chu'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /me'i khams
489b4('bum): su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /rlung gi khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /nam mkha'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /
489b5('bum): ma rig par dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /'du byed du dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /ming dang gzugs su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /skye
489b6('bum): mched drug tu dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /sred par dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /len par dmigs pa ma mchis
489b7('bum): so/ /srid par dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /skye bar dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /rga shir dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /tshul khrims
490a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin bar dmigs pa ma mchis
490a2('bum): so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /nang stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /phyi stong pa nyid du
490a3('bum): dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /chen po stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /don dam pa
490a4('bum): stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du
490a5('bum): dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid du dmigs pa
490a6('bum): ma mchis so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma
490a7('bum): mchis so/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis
490b1('bum): so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /dbang po
490b2('bum): rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /stobs rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par dmigs
490b3('bum): pa ma mchis so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /bsam gtan rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /tshad med pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /gzugs
490b4('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad du dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /mthar gyis gnas ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgur dmigs pa ma mchis
490b5('bum): so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med par dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /mngon par shes pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams su dmigs
490b6('bum): pa ma mchis so/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /
490b7('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /snying rje chen por dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /rgyun du zhugs
491a1('bum): pa'i 'bras bur dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur dmigs pa ma mchis
491a2('bum): so| |dgra bcom pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /rang byang chub tu dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /byang chub tu dmigs pa ma
491a3('bum): mchis so/ /sangs rgyas su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos su dmigs pa ma mchis te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ dmigs pa'i tshul du nye bar gnas pa ma
491a4('bum): lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar gang gis dmigs par bgyi ba dang / gang la dmigs par bgyi ba dang / gang du dmigs par bgyi ba de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid de
491a5('bum): la ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka /de de bzhin no/ de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des mi dmigs pa'i tshul du
491a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yun ring por spyod pas/ des byang chub kyang mi dmigs na/ sangs rgyas lta ci smos/ sangs rgyas kyi chos lta'ang ci smos/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/
491a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyi/ de ma lags pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan la mi spyod dam/ bcom ldan
491b1('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po kun la'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis spyod de/ des sbyin pa'ang mi dmigs
491b2('bum): gtong ba'ang mi dmigs/ len pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /tshul khrims kyang mi dmigs/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs/ tshul khrims ngan pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /bzod pa'ang mi
491b3('bum): dmigs/ bzod pa dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs/ gnod sems kyang mi dmigs so/ /brtson 'grus kyang ma dmigs/ brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs/ le lo'ang mi dmigs
491b4('bum): so/ /bsam gtan yang mi dmigs/ bsam gtan dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs/ 'khrug pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /shes rab kyang mi dmigs/ shes rab dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs/ shes rab
491b5('bum): 'chal pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /kau shi ka /'on kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gzugs mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'du shes mi dmigs
491b6('bum): pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sna mi dmigs
491b7('bum): pa'i tshul dang / lce mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lus mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / gzugs mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sgra mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
492a1('bum): dri mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ro mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / reg mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chos mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig gi rnam par
492a2('bum): shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i
492a3('bum): tshul dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rna
492a4('bum): ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi
492a5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las
492a6('bum): byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul
492a7('bum): dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung pa'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sa'i khams mi dmigs
492b1('bum): pa'i tshul dang / chu'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / me'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rlung gi khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / nam mkha'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul
492b2('bum): dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ma rig pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ming
492b3('bum): dang gzugs mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / skye mched drug mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sred pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul
492b4('bum): dang / len pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / srid pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / skye ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rga shi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs
492b5('bum): pa'i tshul dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i
492b6('bum): tshul dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi stong pa
492b7('bum): nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chen po stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / don
493a1('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
493a2('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rang bzhin
493a3('bum): stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid
493a4('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi
493a5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i
493a6('bum): tshul dang / dbang po lnga mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / stobs lnga mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
493a7('bum): brgyad pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / bsam gtan bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / tshad med pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul
493b1('bum): dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mi
493b2('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mngon par shes pa lnga mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ting nge 'dzin thams
493b3('bum): cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul
493b4('bum): dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / snying rje chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rgyun du zhugs
493b5('bum): pa'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dgra bcom pa nyid mi dmigs
493b6('bum): pa'i tshul dang / rang byang chub mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad
493b7('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol
494a1('bum): tu phyin pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims bsrung ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /
494a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa yongs su bsgrub pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /shes
494a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /shes rab
494a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro
494a5('bum): ba'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos la rnam par lta ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /
494a6('bum): kau shi ka /'di lta ste/ dper na/ dzam+bu'i gling gi shing rnams lo ma sna tshogs can/ me tog sna tshogs can/ 'bras bu sna tshogs can/ dbyibs sna tshogs can/ chu zheng sna tshogs can du
494a7('bum): 'khod kyang de dag gi gri ba ma la khyad par ram/ bye brag mi dmigs te/ gzhan du na grib ma grib ma zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro bar zad do/ /kau shi ka /de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga
494b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su yongs su bsngos pa rnams la'ang khyad par ram/ bye brag mi dmigs so/ /brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
494b2('bum): 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa'i slad du yon tan chen po dang ldan pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/
494b3('bum): yon tan tshad ma mchis pa dang ldan pa'i slad du tshad ma mchis pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ yon tan mu ma mchis pa dang ldan pa'i slad du
494b4('bum): yon tan kun tu mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du bgyis te bcangs
494b5('bum): ba dang / me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur
494b6('bum): stir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis te/ de nas gong du ji skad du bstan pa bzhin shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis pa dang / rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs
494b7('bum): kyi bu mo la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bgyis te gzhan la stsal na/ de gnyis las gang gis bsod nams cher 'phel bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
495a1('bum): stsal pa/ kau shi ka /de bas na/ khyod nyid la dris/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lung ston cig /kau shi ka /de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs
495a2('bum): kyi bu mo la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mang po la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan
495a3('bum): dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod pa byas pa dang / rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
495a4('bum): gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam zhig gzhan la byin te bgo bshar byas pa dang / rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam po
495a5('bum): de blangs te me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror
495a6('bum): byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ de dag las gang gi bsod nams cher 'phel ba yin/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis
495a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te/ de la rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mang po la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos
495b1('bum): dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par
495b2('bum): bgyis pa bas/ gang la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam gzhan la stsal na/ 'di ni/ de bas bsod nams cher 'phel lo/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs
495b3('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang don de nyid gzigs te rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas rdo rje lta bu'i sku bshig ste/ sems can gyi ris na de bzhin
495b4('bum): gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyis 'dul ba'i sems can mchis pa rnams kyi slad du thugs rje chen po bskyed de de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung du byin gyis brlabs so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang la
495b5('bum): las chung du na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam la mchod pa sna tshogs kyis mchod par bgyis na/ de dag thams cad kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i mthar ma thug par sdug
495b6('bum): bsngal mthar 'byin par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka /de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ kau shi ka /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu
495b7('bum): phyin pa 'di glegs bam du byas te me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs
496a1('bum): kyis rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod pa byas pa bas/ gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris te chos kyi dga' bas
496a2('bum): gzhan la byin na/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams cher 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka /gzhan yang rigs kyi ba'am rigs kyi bu mo la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu
496a3('bum): phyin pa 'di ji skad du bstan pa bzhin du gzhan gyi drung du song ste bshad cing bstan pa dang / brjod cing bkrol ba dang / rnam par phye ste gsal bar byas na/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi
496a4('bum): bu mo de ni/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo snga ma dag pas bsod nams cher 'phel te/ de ni/ ston pa yin par bsam mo/ /bla ma'i gnas mkhas pa tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la
496a5('bum): la zhig yin par bsam mo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /'di la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston pa yin te/ ston pa ni/ gzhan/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gzhan zhes
496a6('bum): bya ba med kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ston pa/ ston pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslab
496a7('bum): pas/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
496b1('bum): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa de dag kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i
496b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' rnams las gud na med de/ de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs
496b3('bum): rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslab cing nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang
496b4('bum): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/ thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /thob bo/ /'thob
496b5('bum): par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslab cing rang byang chub tu
496b6('bum): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang shes
496b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslab cing / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs so/ /'jug go /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
497a1('bum): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /ko shi ka /de bas na/ rigs kyi bu'am/
497a2('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang /
497a3('bum): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis mngon du rim gror bya bar 'dod pa dang / bkur stir bya bar 'dod pa dang / phu dud du bya bar 'dod pa dang / mchod
497a4('bum): par bya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris te me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
497a5('bum): ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya'o/ /bkur stir bya'o/ /phu dud du bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /kau shi ka /ngas don de nyid kyi dbang yang dag par mthong ste bla na med pa yang
497a6('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'di snyam ste/ gang zhig la bdag gis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byas te brten cing rnam
497a7('bum): par spyad par bya snyam na/ kau shi ka /de la ngas 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye rgu dang / mi dang / lha
497b1('bum): dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i nang na de dang 'dra ba'am/ lhag pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong nas de la ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/ de lta yin na/ bdag gis chos zhi ba/ bzang po gang
497b2('bum): bdag nyid kyis mngon par sangs rgyas pa de nyid la rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byas te brten cing rnam par spyad par bya'o/ snyam du bsams so/ /kau shi ka /chos de'ang
497b3('bum): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yin te/ kau shi ka /de ltar nga nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la rim gror byed/ bkur stir byed/ phu dud du
497b4('bum): byed/ mchod par byed de/ de ltar rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byas shing rnam par spyod na/ kau shi ka /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par
497b5('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza'
497b6('bum): dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba lha ci smos/ nyan
497b7('bum): thos kyi theg pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la me tog dang / phreng
498a1('bum): ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya ba
498a2('bum): dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba lta ci smos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
498a3('bum): dpa' chen po rnams so/ /byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
498a4('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas las byung ba ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams so/ /kau shi ka /de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu
498a5('bum): dang rigs kyi bu mo'am/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la me tog dang / phreng ba
498a6('bum): dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya'o/ /bkur stir bya'o/ /phu dud du
498a7('bum): bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /de ltar de la slob pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /
498b1('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo/ thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas
498b2('bum): kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob bo/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ brgya byin gyi le'u ste/ nyi shu gnyis pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis gal te dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can de dag dge ba bcu'i las
498b3('bum): kyi lam la bkod par gyur na/ kau shi ka /de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de de'i rgyus bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /
498b4('bum): bde bar gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka /de bas kyang la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam bklag pa'am/ bri ba'am/ /
498b5('bum): kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos gang la rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs
498b6('bum): kyi bu mo slob cing yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur pa dang / 'jug pa dang / 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pa dang / thob pa dang / 'thob par
499a1('bum): 'gyur ba dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pa dang / thob pa dang / 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pa dang /
499a2('bum): thob pa dang / 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur ba dang / thob pa dang / 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang sangs rgyas kyi byang
499a3('bum): chub thob par gyur pa dang / thob pa dang / 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon
499a4('bum): med par zhugs par gyur pa dang / 'jug pa dang / 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / mngon
499a5('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos mang po rgya cher bstan to/ /kau shi ka /zag pa med pa'i chos rgya cher bstan pa de dag gang
499a6('bum): zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam
499a7('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po
499b1('bum): stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /
499b2('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa
499b3('bum): nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang
499b4('bum): po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa
499b5('bum): bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms bar 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
499b6('bum): dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
499b7('bum): dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po
500a1('bum): dang / btang snyoms chen po dang 'di dag ni/ zag pa med pa'i chos te/ de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las rgya cher bstan to/ /de dag la bslab
500a2('bum): cing rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon
500a3('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka /sems can gcig cig rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bzhag na/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du
500a4('bum): 'phel gyi/ dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pas ni/ ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa'i
500a5('bum): sems can rnams ni/ sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas yongs su grol ba ma yin no/ /kau shi ka /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la
500a6('bum): bkod pa'i sems can ni/ sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas yongs su grol ba'i phyir te/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
500a7('bum): dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa lta ci smos/ kau shi ka /gang la las dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang /
500b1('bum): lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa bas/ la la zhig gis sems can gcig cig rang byang
500b2('bum): chub la bzhag na/ 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /kau shi ka/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad rang byang chub tu bkod pa bas/ rigs
500b3('bum): kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis sems can gcig cig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bzhag na/ 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
500b4('bum): sems can gcig po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu gzhog pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi gcad pa'i don du zhugs pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /byang chub
500b5('bum): sems dpa' las byung ba ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams so/ /kau shi ka /byang chub sems dpa'
500b6('bum): las byung ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so/ /kau shi ka /rnam grangs des na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang
500b7('bum): mchod cing rim gror bya ba yin te/ 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgus me tog dang / phreng ba dang /
501a1('bum): spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya ba dang /
501a2('bum): bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba yin par shes par bya'o/ /kau shi ka /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las
501a3('bum): kyi lam la bkod par gyur na/ kau shi ka /de ci snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ brgya byin gyis gsol ba/ bcom
501a4('bum): ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka /de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi
501a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam bri ba'am/ bklag pa'am/ /kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol
501a6('bum): tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslab cing rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /
501a7('bum): 'jug go /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob
501b1('bum): par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob po/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams
501b2('bum): kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go /'jug
501b3('bum): par 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'i/ /mngon bar rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur
501b4('bum): ro/ /kau shi ka /zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson
501b5('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa
501b6('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong ba nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog
501b7('bum): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs
502a1('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi
502a2('bum): dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
502a3('bum): dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /
502a4('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin
502a5('bum): thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
502a6('bum): pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan
502a7('bum): to/ /kau shi ka /rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du byas te bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i
502b1('bum): phyir gzhan la byin na/ de ni/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/
502b2('bum): de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha
502b3('bum): rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams
502b4('bum): yod do/ /tshangs ris kye lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /
502b5('bum): chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med dge ba'i lha
502b6('bum): rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi che ba'i lha
502b7('bum): rnams yod do/ /mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og min gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched
503a1('bum): kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes med 'du shes med
503a2('bum): min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
503a3('bum): pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid
503a4('bum): stong pa nyid yod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
503a5('bum): nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid
503a6('bum): stong pa nyid yod do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa
503a7('bum): nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/ / yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /stobs rnams yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag
503b1('bum): rnams yod do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ /bsam gtan rnams yod do/ /tshad med pa rnams yod do/ /gzugs med pa'i
503b2('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med
503b3('bum): pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ /mi
503b4('bum): 'jigs pa rnams yod do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/ /snying rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /lan
503b5('bum): gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
503b6('bum): pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong pa rnams yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /
503b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /kau shi ka /dzam+bu'i gling gi sems
504a1('bum): can rnams lta zhog gi / kau shi ka gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i las
504a2('bum): kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka /de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo //
504a3('bum): bde bar gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka /de bas rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs
504a4('bum): bam bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu
504a5('bum): phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslab cing rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go /
504a6('bum): 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur
504a7('bum): ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams
504b1('bum): kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug
504b2('bum): go / 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
504b3('bum): 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka /zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson
504b4('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong
504b5('bum): pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa
504b6('bum): stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po
504b7('bum): med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /
505a1('bum): dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam
505a2('bum): gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam
505a3('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin
505a4('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen
505a5('bum): po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/ /kau shi ka /rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs
505a6('bum): kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du
505a7('bum): 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau sha ka /de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing
505b1('bum): mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha
505b2('bum): rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod
505b3('bum): do/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med
505b4('bum): snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /
505b5('bum): che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /
505b6('bum): shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og min gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye
505b7('bum): mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /tshul
506a1('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /
506a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam pa
506a3('bum): stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dor ba med
506a4('bum): pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa
506a5('bum): stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul
506a6('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /stobs rnams yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden
506a7('bum): pa rnams yod do/ /bsam gtan rnams yod do/ /tshad med pa rnams yod do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar gyis
506b1('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yod
506b2('bum): do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/ /snying rje chen po rnams yod
506b3('bum): do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa
506b4('bum): nyid yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /
506b5('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
506b6('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /kau shi ka /gling chen po bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams lta zhog gi /kau shi ka /stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur
506b7('bum): bu'i sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka /de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am/
507a1('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan
507a2('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka /de bas rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir
507a3('bum): gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher
507a4('bum): bstan te/ de dag la bslab cing / rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu ma dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i
507a5('bum): 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par
507a6('bum): gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ /thob
507a7('bum): bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na
507b1('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka /zag pa med
507b2('bum): pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
507b3('bum): dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong
507b4('bum): pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med
507b5('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo
507b6('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga
507b7('bum): dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i
508a1('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
508a2('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi
508a3('bum): 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rigs bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang
508a4('bum): snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/ /kau shi ka /rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu
508a5('bum): phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches med du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe
508a6('bum): na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing ma thob rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs
508a7('bum): che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i
508b1('bum): lha rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha
508b2('bum): rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod
508b3('bum): do| |kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams
508b4('bum): yod do/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin tu mthong
508b5('bum): ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og min gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha
508b6('bum): rnams yod do/ /cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha
508b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /nang
509a1('bum): stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /
509a2('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /
509a3('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo
509a4('bum): nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod
509a5('bum): do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /stobs rnams yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ /bsam
509a6('bum): gtan rnams yod do/ /tshad med pa rnams yod do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu
509a7('bum): yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams
509b1('bum): yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/ /snying rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
509b2('bum): bco brgyad yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /
509b3('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra
509b4('bum): bcom pa rnams yod do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
509b5('bum): rnams yod do/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po brgya nyer dgu pa/ /kau shi ka /stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu lta zhog gi /kau shi ka /
509b6('bum): stong gnyis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka /de ji snyam
509b7('bum): du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das
510a1('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka /de bas rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam la bri ba dang / bklag pa dang /
510a2('bum): kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams
510a3('bum): rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslab cing rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i
510a4('bum): 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /
510a5('bum): thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob
510a6('bum): par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag
510a7('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka /zag pa med pa'i chos
510b1('bum): de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam
510b2('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don
510b3('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa
510b4('bum): stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo
510b5('bum): bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang /
510b6('bum): stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i
510b7('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi
511a1('bum): sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
511a2('bum): pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/ /
511a3('bum): kau shi ka /rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan
511a4('bum): la byin na/ de bas de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya
511a5('bum): cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs tshe zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal
511a6('bum): chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan
511a7('bum): 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod
511b1('bum): do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge'i lha rnams
511b2('bum): yod do/ /tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha
511b3('bum): rnams yod do/ /mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og min gyi lha rnams yod do/ /
511b4('bum): nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes med 'du shes
511b5('bum): med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
511b6('bum): yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa
511b7('bum): nyid yod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /
512a1('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi
512a2('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
512a3('bum): yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /stobs rnams yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan
512a4('bum): lag rnams yod do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ /bsam gtan rnams yod do/ /tshad med pa rnams yod do/ /gzugs med
512a5('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
512a6('bum): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod
512a7('bum): do/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/ /snying rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i
512b1('bum): 'bras bu yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid yod do/ /
512b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/ /rang
512b3('bum): sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /kau shi
512b4('bum): ka / stong gnyis pa'i 'jigs rten gyi khams 'bring po lta zhig gi /kau shi ka /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi
512b5('bum): bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka /de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsal pa/
512b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka /de bas rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol
512b7('bum): tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam bri ba dang / bklag pa dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar shes
513a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslab cing rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i
513a2('bum): skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
513a3('bum): bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob
513a4('bum): par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang
513a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//
513a6('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka /zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
513a7('bum): pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha
513b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid
513b2('bum): dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos
513b3('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
513b4('bum): pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags
513b5('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa
513b6('bum): brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting
513b7('bum): nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
514a1('bum): 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med
514a2('bum): pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/ /kau shi ka /rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing bklag pa dang / bri ba
514a3('bum): dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
514a4('bum): 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba
514a5('bum): rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i lha
514a6('bum): rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /
514a7('bum): tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha
514b1('bum): rnams yod do/ /chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med che
514b2('bum): ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams
